text: Þy gemyndgadan gere þære foresprecenan sunnan asprungennisse & hræðe sona þæs æfterfylgendan wooles & moncwilde, ðy geare Deosdedit se sexta ærcebiscop Contwaraburge cirican forðferde þy ærran dægeiduum Iuliarum.
Swelce eac Erconberht Contwara cyning þy ylcan monðe <ond> dæge forðgeleorde, & his riices eðel forlet Ecgberhte his suna, þæt he hæfde & heold anes wonðe twentig wintra.
Þa blon micelre tiide se biscopdom, ða wæs sended to Rome from Ecgberhte & from Osweo Norðanhymbra cyninge Wigheard mæssepreost, swa swa we in þisse ærran bec feaum wordum forecwædon.
Wæs se mon in ciriclecum þeodscipum of Ongolcynne wel gelæred.
Swylce hy eac þa cyningas begen ætgædre sendon þæm apostolican <papan> micle gife on monegum goldfatum & seolforfatum: ond bædon, þæt he Wigheard Ongolcynnes ciricum to ærcebiscope gehalgode.
Ða he ða to Rome cwom, þa wæs in þa tid Uitalius papa þæs apostolican seðles aldorbiscop.

Æfter þon þe he þone intingan his siðfætes þæm apostolican papan gecyðed hæfde, þa æfter medmicelre tide se Wigheard & lytestne alle his geferan, þa ðe mid him cwomon, þy ofercumendan woole fordilgade wæron & forð geleorde.
Ða hæfde se apostolica papa geþeaht be þissum þingum & georne sohte, hwelcne ærcebiscop he onsendan meahte Ongolðeode ciricum.
Ða wæs in Niridano þæm mynstre, þæt is unfeor þære byrig Neapoli in Campanie þære mægðe, Adrianus abbud.
Wæs se mon in halgum gewreotum & in mynsterlecum þeodscipum & in ciriclecum wel gelæred, & weorðlice getyd ge in Lædenisc gereorde ge in Grecisc.
Þa het se papa þone mon to him gelaðian, & heht þæt he biscophade onfenge & to Breotone ferde.

Þa ondswarede he him & cwæð, þæt he wære swa micles hades unwyrðe; & cwæð þæt he meahte oðerne getæcnan, þe biscophada wyrðra wære ge on gelærednesse ge on his lifes gegearnunge ge on <gedefre><../images/etail.gif>ldo.
Tæhte þa þam biscope in þæm neahnunnmynstre sumne gedefne munuc, þæs noma wæs Andreas.
Ac ða wiðstod his lichomlic untrymnes, þæt he biscop beon ne meahte.
Eft se papa nedde þone abbud Adrianus, þæt he biscophade onfenge.
Þa bæd he hine eldenne & fyrstes, hwæðer he æfter fæce meahte oðerne findan, þe mon to biscope hadian meahte.
Wæs in þa tid sum munuc in Rome, se wæs cuð <Adriane> þæm abbude, þæs noma wæs Theodorus.

Se wæs acenned in Tarso Cilicio: wæs se mon ge in weoruldgewreotum, ge in godcundum, ge in Grecisc ge in Læden wel gelæred; & he gecoren wæs in his þeawum & arwyrðre ældo, þæt is þæt he hæfde syx & syxtig wintra.
Þeosne mon Adrianus se abbud þæm papan cyðde, & sægde þæt he to biscope gehalgad beon meahte: & he þæt geþafode.

Ond hwæðre þis aræddon betweonum him, þæt he se abbud his latteow beon sceolde in Breotone, forþon þe he ær twiga þa dælas Gallia rices fore missenlecum intingum geferde & gesohte, & forþon þe him se weg þæs siðfætes genoh cuð wæs, & eac swylce þæt he wæs in his agnum geferscipe wel gemonnad.

Ond þonne gen eac þætte he scolde his fultemend beon in godcundre lare, ond þæt he geornlice bihealdan scolde, þæt he nowiht wiðerweardes þære soðfæstnesse þæs geleafan Greca þeawe in Ongolcynnes cirican inn gelædde, þe he ofer beon sceolde.

Þa wæs he ærest to subdiacone gehalgad; & þa baad feower monað, oððæt him feax geweoxe, þæt he to preoste bescoren beon meahte, forþon þe he ær sceare hæfde eastleoda þeawe Sancte Paule þæs apostoles.
Þa wæs he gehalgad from Uitalio þæm papan to biscope ymb syx hund wintra & eahta & syxtig wintra from Drihtnes menniscnesse, þy seofeðan dæge & þy drihtenlecanKalendarum Aprelium.
& swa ætgædre mid Adriano þam abbude inSexta Kalendas Juniaswæs to Breotone onsended.
Þa ferdon heo ætgædre ærest to Masilia & þonon þurh Arela lond, þæt heo cwomon to Iohanne þæm ærcebiscope þære ceastre; & him sealdon Uitalianus gewrit þæs papan, þæt heo mon mid are onfenge.
& he swa dyde; hæfde heo mid micelre are mid him, oðþæt Ebrinus se ealdormon him spede & leafnesse sealde to ferenne, swa hwider swa heo woldon.
Ða ferde Theodorus se biscop to ægelberhte biscope Parissiorum, bi þæm we beforan sægdon; ond from him fremsumlice wæs onfongen, & micle tid mid him wel gehæfd wæs.
Adrianus ferde ærest to Emme Senonum & æfter þam to Pharaonem Mælda biscopum, & longe mid him wel gehæfd wæs.
Forþon hy nedde se towearda winter, þæt heo stille wunedon, swa hwær swa heo meahten.

Þa ðæt þa cuðe ærendwrecan sægdon Ecgberhte þæm cyninge, þætte se biscop wære in Froncna rice, þone þe hy Osweo bædon from þam Romaniscan biscope, ða sende he sona Reðfrið his gerefan þider, þæt he scolde hine fetigan & to him gelædan.
Þa he þa þider cwom, þa nom he Theodor biscop mid Ebrinus leafnesse þæs ealdormonnes, & hine gelædde to þam porte, þe is nemned Cwæntwic.
Þær hine gestod sumu untrymnis, & he þær fæc gewunade; & sona swa he trumian ongon, swa eode he in scip & ferde to Breotone.
Ebrinus se ealdormon genom Adrianum þone abbud & on fæstene hæfde, forþon he resade, þæt he hæfde caseres ærendo sumo to Breotone cyningum wið Froncna rice, þæs he ða micle gemenne <hæfde>.
Ac þa he þa soðlice onget & onfand, þæt hit swa ne wæs, swa he resade, þa onlesde he hine & let feran æfter þam biscope.
Ond sona þæs þe he to him cwom, þa sealde he him Sancte Petres mynster, þær þæra ærcebiscopa liic bebyrged seondon, swa swa we ær beforan sægdon.
Forþon se apostolica papa bebead Theodore biscope, þa he from him ferde, þæt he him on his biscopscire gerisne stowe foresege & salde, in þære he mid his geferum wunian meahte.
Þa cwom he Theodor biscop to his cirican in Contwara burg þy æfteran geare halgunge ðy syxtan dægeKalendarum Iuniarum.
& he lifde on biscophade aan & twentig wintra & þreo monað & syx & twentig daga.
Ond he sona ðurhferde eall Breotone ealond, swa hwyder ymb swa Ongolþeode drohtedon & wunedon; & he lustlice from eallum onfongen wæs, & his word geornlice geherdon.
Ond he rehte endebyrdnesse lifes æteawde, & rihte Eastran to weorðianne lærde.
Ond him Adrianus se abbud mid ferde, & to eallum rehte fultemade.
Wæs he ærest ærcebiscopa, þæt him eall Ongolcyn hrynesse geþafode.

Ond forðon heo begen wæron ge se biscop ge se abbud, swa swa we ær cwædon, wel gelæred ge on godcundum gewreotum ge in weoruldcundum, ond heo gesomnodon micelne þreat discipula; & heo betweoh halige bec & ciriclicne þeodscipe in metercræft & in tungolcræft & in gramaticcræft <tydon> & lærdon.
Wæs þæt sweotol tacn, þætte heora discipulas wæron wel gelærde ge in Grecisc gereorde ge in Lædenisc; ond him þa swa cuðe wæron swa heora agen, þe heo in fedde wæron.
Ne wæron her æfre, seoþðan Ongolcyn Breotone gesohte, gesæligran tide ne fægeran.
Wæron her stronge cyningas & wel cristne ond eallum ellreordum cynnum ut in miclum ege; ond ealra willa hleonade to geheranne þa gefean þæs heofonlecan rices.
Ond swa hwelce men swa swa wilnadon þæt heo in halgum leorningum tyde wæron, heo hæfdon gearwe magistras, þa ðe heo lærdon & tydon.
Swylce eac sonas to singenne in circan, ða ðe oððæt in Cent anre menn cuðon, of þære tide ongunnon men leornian þurh ealle cirican Ongolcynnes.
Ond ærest, buton Iacobe þæm songere bi þæm we beforan ær sægdon, wæs songes magister Norðanhymbra cirican ædde haten, þæs freo noma wæs Steffanus.
Wæs se asponen from Cent from Wilferðe þæm arwyrðan biscope, se ærest betweoh biscopum, þa ðe of Ongolþeode wæron, regollicne þeaw to lifgenne Ongolcynnes ciricum <sægde> & lærde.
Þa ferde Theodor biscop geond ealle Ongolcynnes mægðe, & biscopas halgode in gelimplecum stowum.
Ond þa þing, þe he unfulfremed gemette, mid heora fultume he ða rehte & bette.

Betweoh þon, þa he Ceddan biscop mid wordum þreade, þæt he rihtlice gehalgad ne wære, þa ondsworede he eaðmodre stefne: Gif þu þæt wast, þæt ic unrehtlice biscophade onfeng, ic lustlice from þære þegnunge gewite, forþon ic þy hade mec seolfne næfre wyrðne demde.
Ac for intingan hersumnesse ic haten geþafode, þæt ic þone had underhnah, þeah ðe ic unwyrðe wære.
Þa he ða gehyrde þa eaðmodnesse his ondsware, cwæð he þæt he þone biscophad forlætan ne scolde.
Ac he eft his hadunge mid ciriclice rihte gefylde.
In þa tid Deosdedit se biscop forðferde; & Contwara burge biscop soht & sended wæs to hadienne.
Ond Willferð biscop eac swylce of Breotone in Gallia rice to hadienne sended wæs.
He ða eac in Cent mæssepreostas & diaconas hadode, oðþæt þe Theodor ærcebiscop to his seðle cwom.

Sona þæs ðe he cwom to Hrofesceastre, & forðferdum Damiano þam biscope se biscophad longe blon, þa gehadode he sumne mon, se wæs ma in ciriclecum þeodscipum & in lifes bylwitnesse gelæred, þon he from wære in worulde þingum, þæs noma wæs Putta.
Wæs he swiðost in cirican songcræft getyd Romanisce þeawe, þone he geleornade from Sancte Gregories discipulum.
In ða tid wæs in Mercna mægðe Wulfhere cyning.

Ða forðferdum Gearomonne biscope bæd he Theodor biscop, þæt he him & his leodum biscop funde & sealde, þa ne wolde he him neowne biscop halgian, ac bæd Osweo Norðanhymbra cyning, þæt he him Ceaddan gehalgodne biscop sealde, se ða in his mynstre, þæt is in Læstinge, in stillnesse liifde.
Þegnade Wilferð biscop þone biscophad in Eoforwicceastre & eac swylce in eallum Norðanhymbrum ge eac in Peohtum, swa Osweoes rice wæs þæs cyninges.

Ond forþon þeaw wæs þæm ilcan arwyrðan biscope, þæt he þæt weorc þæs halgan godspelles, ma þurh his fota gong gefremede, þonne on horse ride, heht hine Theodor biscop ridan, þær him se weg lengra gelumpe.
& he swiðe wið þon wonn for geornfulnesse & for lufan þæs aarfæstan gewinnes.

Þa nedde se ærcebiscop hine swiðe, þæt he ridan scolde, swa hwyder swa ðæs þearf wære, & efne æt nehstan mid his seolfes hondum up on hors hof; forþon he ðone mon micelne & haligne gemette in his lifes geearnungum.
Ða onfeng Ceadda biscopdom Mercna þeode ætgædre & Lindesfearena; ond he sona æfter bisene haligra fædra in micelre fulfremednesse lifes þone biscophad heold & þegnade.
Sealde him & geaf Wulfhere se cyning fiftig hida in Lindisse him mynster on to getimbrenne in þære stowe þe is nemned æt Bearwe.
In þæm mynstre nu gen oð to dæge þa sweðe awuniað regollices lifes, þe he þær gesette.
Hæfde he bisceopseðl in þære stowe, þe geceged is Liccedfeld, þær he forðferde & bebyrged is.
Þær gen to dæge seðel is Mærcna mægðe þara æfterfylgendra biscopa.

Getimbrede he eac sundorwic noht feor from þære cirican, bi ðæm he deagolice mid feaum broðrum, þæt is seofonum oðþo eahtum, he gewunade, þæt he him gebæd, & his bec rædde, swa oft swa he from þæm gewinne þære þegnunge godcundre lare æmetig wæs.

Þa he ða in þære mægðe tu ger & þridda healf þa cirican wuldorlice heold & rehte, ða cwom seo tid, þe uplican dome stihtigende, bi þære spriceð Eclesiastes seo boc:Tempus mittendi lapides et tempus colligendi:þætte tid wære stanas to sendenne & tid to somnienne.
Þa cwom micel wæl & moncwild godcundlice sended, þæt þurh lichoman deað þa lifigendan stanas þære cirican of eorðlicum seþlum to þæm heofonlican timbre gebær.
Mid þy þa monige of þære gesomnunge þæs ilcan arwyrðan biscopes of lichoman alædde wæron, þa cwom his tid, þæt he scolde of middangearde to Drihtne feran.
Þa gelomp sume dæge, þæt he wæs in þæm foresprecenan wicum mid ane breðer wuniende, þæs noma wæs Owine.
His oðre geferan fore gelimplicum intingum hwurfon to cirican in þæt mynster.

Wæs he se ilca Oowine munuc micelre geearnunge mon, & mid hlutre ingehygde þæs uplecan edleanes wæs <iu> middangeard forlætende; & he wæs þurh all meodum & Gode gecoren; ond him Drihten synderlice his deagolnisse onwrah.
Cwom he mid æðelþryþe of Eastenglum; ond he wæs hire þegna & huses & hire geferscipes ofer all aldormon.
Ða Godes geleafa þa weox & haat wæs, þa þohte he þæt he sceolde worulde wiðsacan, & þæt unaswundenlice swa gedyde.
& hine middangeardes þingum to þon ongyrede & genacodade, þæt he eal forlet, þa ðe he hæfde, nemne his anfealdne gegyrelan, ond cwom to Læstinga ea to þæm mynstre þæs aarwyrðan biscopes.
Bær him æxe & adosan on honda; tacnode in þon, þæt he nales to idelnesse, swa sume oðre, ac to gewinne in þæt mynster eode; & þæt seolfe eac swylce mid dædum gecyðde.
Ond forþon þe he lyt genihtsumade in smeaunge & in leornunge haligra gewreota, he þy ma mid his hondum wonn & worhte þa þing, þe nydþearfleco wæron.
Þæs is to tacne, þæt he mid þone biscop in þæm foresprecenan wicum for his arwyrðnesse & for his geornfullnesse betweoh þa broðor wæs hæfd.
Ðonne heo inne heora leornunge & heora & becrædon beeodon, þonne wæs he ute wyrcende, swa hwæt swa þearf gesegen wæs.

Ða he þa sume dæge hwæthwugu swelces ute dyde, & his geferan to byrig to cirican eodon, swa heo gelomlice dydon, ond se biscop ana in þære cirican oðþo in becrædinge oððo on gebedum geornful wæs, þa geherde he semninga, swa swa he eft æfter þon sægde, þa swetestan stefne & þa fægrestan singendra & blissiendra of heofonum oð eorðan astigan.

Ða stefne & þone song he cwæð þæt he ærest geherde from eastsuðdæle heofones, þæt is from heanisse þære winterlecan sunnan upgonge, & þonon to him sticcemælum nealecton, oðþæt he bicwom to þeacan þære cirican, þe se biscop in wæs; & ingongende ealle gefylde, & in ymbhwyrfte ymbsealde.
Ond he þa geornlice his mod aðenede in þa þing ðe he gehyrde.
Þa geherde he eft, swa swa healfre tide fæce, of hrofe þære ilcan cirican up astigan þone ilcan blissesong, & þy ylcan wege, þe he ær cwom, <upp> oð heofonas mid unasecgendre swetnesse eft hweorfan.
Ða wunade he ðær sum fæc tide wundriende & wafiende, & mid behygdige mode þohte & smeade, hwæt þa þing beon sceolde.
Ða ontynde se biscop þæt eaghþyrel þære cirican & mid his honda slog tacen, swa swa his gewuna wæs, gif hwylc mon ute wære, þæt he in to him eode.
Ða eode he sona in to him.
Cwæð he se biscop him to: Gong hræðe to cirican, & hat ure seofon broðor hider to me cuman: & þu eac swelce mid wæs.

Þa heo þa to him cwomon, þa monade he heo ærest, þæt heo betweonan him þæt mægen lufan & sibbe & betweohn eallum Godes monnum geornlice heolde; ond eac swelce þa gesetenesse þæs regollican þeodscipes, þe hy from him geleornodon & on him gesegon, oðþe in þara forðgeleoredra fædra dædum oðþe godcundum gemete, þæt heo þa ungewergedre geornfulnisse fylgden & læsten.

Æfter þon he underþeodde & him sægde, þæt se dæg swiðe neah stode his forðfore, & þus cwæð: Se leofa cuma & se lufiendleca, se ðe gewunade ure broðor neosian, se cwom swelce to dæge to me & mec of worulde cegde & laðode.

Forðon ge þonne nu eft hweorfað to cirican & biddað ure broðor, þæt heo mine forðfore mid heora gebedum & benum Drihtne bebeoden, ond swelce eac heora seolfra forðfore, þære tide is uncuð, þæt heo gemynen mid wæccenum & gebedum & mid godum forecuman.

Mid þy he ða þas word & þyses gemetes monig to him sprecende wæs, & heo onfongenre his bletsunge swiðe unrote ut from him eodon, ða hwearf se ana eft in to him, se ðe þone heofonlican song gehyrde, & hine eaðmodlice on eorðan astreahte fore þone biscop; & þus cwæð: Min fæder, mot ic þe ohtes ahsian.
Cwæð he: Ahsa þæs þu wille.
Þa cwæð he: Ic þa la halsie & bidde fore Godes lufan, þæt þu me gesecge hwæt se song wære blissiendra, þe ic gehyrde of heofonum cumendra ofer þas cirican ond æfter tide eft hweorfendra to heofonum.
Ondswarede he se biscop: Gif þu songes stefne gehyrde & þu heofonlic weorod ongete ofer us eac cuman, ic ðe bebeode on Drihtnes noman, þæt þu þæt nænegum men cyðe, ne secge ær minre forðfore.
Ic þe soðlice secgo, þætte þæt wæron engla gastas þe þær cwomon, þa me to þam heofonlecan medum cegdon & laðodon, þa ic symle lufade & wilnade.
Ond æfter seofon dagum heo eft hweorfende & cumende me gehehton; & me þonne mid him lædan woldon.
Þæt wæs swa soðlice mid dæd gefylled, swa him to cweden wæs.

Þa wæs he sona gehrinen lichomlicre untrymnesse, & seo dæghwamlice weox & hefigade; & þa ðy seofoþan dæge, swa him gehaten wæs, æfter þon þe his forðfore getrymede mid onfongennesse þæs Drihtenlecan lichoman & blodes, þætte seo halige sawl wæs onlesed from þæs lichoman hefignessum, & mid engla latteowdome & geferscipe, swa riht is to gelyfanne, þa ecan gefean & þa heofonlecan eadignesse gestah & gesohte.
Is þæt hwelc wundor, þeah ðe he þone dæg his deaðes oðþe ma þone Drihtnes dæg bliðe gesege, þone he symle sorgende bad, oð þæt he cwome?

Forðon betweohn monige geearnunge his mægena in forhæfednesse & in eaðmodnesse & in godcundre lare & in gebedum & in wilsumlicre þearfeðnisse & eac oðerra mægena, þæt he wæs swa swiðe Drihtnes ege underþeoded ond swa swiðe his þara nehstena dogra gemyndig in eallum his weorcum, þætte swa swa me sum broðor sægde of þæm þe me in wreotum cyde & lærde, & se wæs in mynstre & in his lareowdome afeded & gelæred; wæs his noma Trumberht; sægde he gif he æt leorninga sæte oððe elles hwæt dyde, gif semninga mare blæd windes astah, þæt he sona instæpe Drihtnes mildheortnesse gecegde & þa miltse bæd monna cynne.

Gif þonne swiðra wind aras, þonne tynde he his bec & forþleat in his ondwlitan & geornlice in his gebede hleoðrade: ond þonne he gen, gif strengra storm & genip swiðor þreade, & legete & þunorrade eorðan & lyfte brægden & fyrhten, þonne eode he to cirican & bighigdelice in gebedum & on sealmsonge fæste moode awunade, oððæt þære lyfte smyltnis eft hwearf & cwom.

Mid þy hine frugnon & ascodon his geferan, for hwon he þis dyde, ondswarode he: Ac ge ne leornodon:Quia intonuit de celo dominus et altissimus dedit uocem suam: misit sagittas suas et dissipauit eos, fulgora multiplicauit et conturbauit eos:ðætte Drihten hleoðrað of heofonum & se hehsta seleð his stefne; he sendeð his stræle & heo toweorpeð: legetas gemonigfealdað & heo gedrefeð.

Forþon Drihten lyfte ontyneð, windas weceð, legetas sceotað of heofonum & hleoðrað, þæt he eorðbigengan awecce hine to ondrædanne; þæt he heora heortan in gemynd gecege þæs toweardan domes; þæt he heora oferhygd toweorpe & geþyrstignesse drefe, to heora mode <gelæddre> þære forhtiendan tide, hwonne he, heofonum & eorðan byrnendum, toweard sy in heofones wolcnum in micelre meahte & þrymme to demanne cwice & deade.

Forþon us gedafenað, þæt we his heofonlicre monunge mid gedefenlice ege & lufan ondswarige; þætte, swa he lyft onstyrge ond his hond swa swa us to sleanne beotiende æteaweð, ne hwæðre nu gyt slæð, þæt we sona cleopien & bidden his mildheortnesse, & geondsmeage ða deagolnesse usse heortan & geclæsnien þa unsyfernesse uncysta, & bihigdelice don, þæt we næfre ne geearnien þæt we slegene beon scylon.
Geþwærað eac swylce þære onwrigenesse & þære gesegene þæs foresprecenan broðor bi forðfore þisses biscopes & eac þæt word þæs arwyrðan fæder Ecgberhtes, bi þæm we beforan sægdon.
Se geo ær mid þone ilcan Ceaddan in Hibernia Scotta ealonde, begen in geoguðe, in munuclife in gebedum & in forhæfdnesse & in leornunge haligra gewrita Gode lifdon.
Ac he Ceadda eft æfter fæce in his eðel hwyrfde in Breotone; se Ecgberht þær in elþeodignesse fore Godes noman awunode oð his lifes ende.

Mid þy ða <æfter> longre tiide cwom to him of Breotone fore neosunge intingan se halgesta wer & se forhæfdesta, Hygebald hatte, se wæs abbud in Lindesse, þa spræcon heo be liife haligra fædra, swa swa halige men gedafonode, & þæt eac onhyrgan wolden.
Betweoh þa cwom gemynd þæs arwyrðan biscopes Ceaddan.

Þa cwæð he Ecgberht: Ic wat sumne mon in þissum ealonde nu gena in lichoman lifigende, mid þy se wer of middangearde leorde, þæt he geseah Ceaddan sawle his broðor mid engla weorude of heofonum astigan: & gefetedon his sawle & mid him genoman & eft hweorfan to þam heofonlecan rice.
Hwæðer he þæt bi him seolfum cwæde þe bi oðrum men hwelcum, þæt us is uncuð.
Hwæðre þa swa micel wer hit gecwæð, <we> weotan þæt hit soð wæs.
Þa forðferde Ceadda þy syxtan dægeNonarum Martiarum: & wæs ærest bibyrged bi Sancta Marian cirican.
Ac æfter fæce, þær getimbrede cirican þæs eadgan aldores þara apostola Sancte Petres, þa wæron in þa his ban geseted.
In æghwæðre þara stowa gewuniað to tacnunge his mægenes & halignisse gelomlecu wundor hælo geworden beon.

Þæs is to tacne, þætte neowan sum gebræcseoc man, mid þy he þurh monige stowe dwoliende orn & ferde, þa bicwom he þider on æfenne, ne weotendum oððo ne gemændum þæm heordum þære stowe, & þær ealle neaht wæs restende: & þa on morne gehælde witte aras & ut eode.
Þa wundredon ealle <menn> & on þæt gefegon, hwylc wundor þær hælo þurh Drihtnes gife æteawde & geworden wæs.
Is ofer his byrgenne stowe treowgeweorc on gelicnesse medmicles huses geworht mid hrægle gegyrwed.
Þonne is on þæm medmicel þyrel geworht, þurh þæt gewuniað þa men, þa ðider for intingan wilsumnisse cumað, heora hond insendan & dæl þære moldan þonon neoman.
Mid þy heo þa in wæter sendað & untrumum monnum & neatum to byrgenne sellað, & heo sona from hefignesse þære untrumnesse generede beoð, & þær gefean þære willendan gesynta onfoð.

In þæs biscopes stowe gehalgode Theodor biscop Wynnferð godne wer & gemetfæstne, se fore wæs in þegnunge biscophades, swa swa his foregengan, Mercna mægðe & Middelengla & Lindesfarona; in eallum þæm Wulfhere, se ða gena lifiende wæs, riices onweald hæfde.
Wæs se Wynnferð of þæs biscopes geferscipe, þæm he eft æfterfylgde, ond under him diaconðegnunge micelre tide brucende wæs.
Betweohn ðas ðing ða Colmanus se biscop, se of Scottum cwom wæs Breotone forlætende, ond mid hine genom ealle þa Scottas, þa he on Lindesfarena ea gesomnade, swelce eac þritig monna of Ongolþeode.
Æghwæðre þara wæron in drohtunge munuclifes geornlice & wel gelærde; & he forlet in þære cirican sume broðor.
Ærest he cwom to Hii þæm ealonde, þonon he wæs sended Ongolþeode Godes word to bodienne & to læranne.
Æfter þon he gewat to sumum medmiclum ealonde þæt is feor ascaden from Hibernia to westdæle; is in Scyttisc genemned Inisbofinde, þæt is ealond hwitre heahfore.
Þa he þa in þæt ealond cwom, þa getimbrede he þær mynster & þa munecas þær gestaðolode, þa he of æghwæðrum cynne gesomnade & mid hine brohte.
Þa heo þa þær gestaðolode & gesette wæron, þa ne meahte heo betweoh him geþwærigan & geweorðan.

Forþon þe Scottas on sumera & on hærfesttide, þonne mon wæstmas insomnode, þon forleton heo þæt mynster ond þurh cuðe stowe swicedon & foron, & þonne on wintra eft ham hwurfon & wilnedon þara goda gemænelice brucan, þe Ongle gewunnon & gegearwodon.

Þa sohte Colmanus þisse gewesnisse & þisse unsibbe læcedom; eode þa ymb monige stowe ge neah ge feor; þa gemette he sume gerisne stowe in Hibernia mynster on to timbrenne, þæt on Scyttisc gereorde Maigeo is nemned.

Ond he gebohte noht micelne dæl þæs londes mynster þær to getimbrenne æt sumum gesiiðe, þe þæt lond ahte, ðære arædnisse toætecedre, þæt heo eac swylce for hine, se ðe him þa stowe gesealde, a þa stondendan munecas þær to Drihtne cleopodon & for hine þingodon.
Ond he hraðe þær mynster getimbrode, & him se gesið eac fultmade & ealle þa neahmen; & he ðær þa Englescan men gesette & gestaðolede, ond Scottas forlet in þæm foresprecenan ealonde.
Þæt mynster oð gen to dæge Englisce men þær in elþeodignesse habbað.

Is þæt þæt mynster, þæt is nu micel of medmiclum gefremed, þe gewunelice is Muigeo nemned; ond geo geara þær eallum gehwerfdum to þæm betran gesetenessum, nu gen æðele weorod nimeð muneca, þa of Ongolcynne þær gesomnode seondon, & to bysene arwyrðra fædra under regole & abbude in micelre forhæfdnesse & clænnisse lifes bi heora agnum hondgewinne lifgað.

Ða wæs ymb syx hund wintra & hundseofontig wintra from Drihtnes menniscnesse, þæt is þæt æftere ger þe Theodor biscop in Breotone cwom, þætte Oswio Norðanhymbra cyning wæs gestonden untrymnesse, on þære he eac forðgeleorde, þa he hæfde yldo eahta & fiftig wintra.

Wæs he se cyning in þa tid bicumen in swa micle lufan þære Romaniscan cirican gesetenisse & þære apostolican, þæt gif he from þære untrymnesse gehæled wære, þæt he wolde to Rome feran & þær æt þam halgum stowum his lif geendigan, ond Wilferð biscop bæd, þæt he him þæs siiðfætes latteow wære, & him micel feoh & unlytel wið þon gebead.
Þa forðferde he þy fiftegðan dægeKalendarum Martiarum, ond Ecgferð his sunu forlet yrfeweard his rices.
Þæs cyninges rices þy þriddan geare Theodor biscop gesomnade biscopa gemot & seonoð ætgædre mid mongum magistrum cirican, ða ðe regollican gesetenesse haligra fædra ge lufedon ge cuðon.
Þa heo ætgædre gesomnade wæron, he ða geornlice ongon læran to healdenne þy moode, þe biscope gedafonode, þa þing þa ðe geþwæredon annesse þære ciriclican sibbe.
Þære seonoðlecan dæde þeosses gemetes gewrit is.

In noman Drihtnes Godes & ures Hælendes Ihesu Cristi, ricsiendum in ecnesse & steorendum his cirican þæm ilcan Drihtne Hælendum Criste, <licade> us efencuman æfter þeawe arwyrðra rehta smeagende bi þæm nedþearflecum intingum Godes cirican.
Efencwomon we in þas stowe, þe is cweden Heorotford, þy twenteogðan dæge & þy feorðan Septembris monþes; wæs seo æreste indictio.
Ic Theodor, þeah ic unwyrðe sy, wæs ic from þæm apostolican seðle sended biscop Contwara burge cirican.
Ond se arwyrðesta sacerd & usser broðor Bise Eastengla biscop, ond swelce eac usser broþor & sacerd Wilferð Norþanhymbra biscop þurh his agenne ærendwrecan ætwæs.
Eac swylce ætwæron ure broðor & sacerdas Putta, Cantwara ceastre biscop seo is cweden Hrofesceaster, Leotherius Westseaxna biscop, Wynferð Mercna biscop.

Mid þy we ða togædre cwomon & æfter endebyrdnesse ætsomne sæton, cwæð ic: Ic biddo eow eac, þa leofestan broðor, for ege & lufan ures Hælendes, þæt we ealle gemænelice smeagan for ussum geleafan, þæt þa domas & þa gesetenesse, þa ðe from halgum fædrum & gecorenum <arædde> & gesette wæron, þætte þa from eallum us ungewemmedlice healdene wæron.

Þa ic ða þas & monig oðer sprecende wæs, þa ðe to Godes lufan gelumpon & to annesse þære halgan cirican, þa frægn ic anra gehwylcne heora æfter endebyrdnesse, hwæðer heo geþafedon þa domas to healdenne, þa ðe geara from halgum fædrum gesette wæron.
Ond ealle þa biscopas him ondsworodon & cwædon, þæt him eallum þa wel licodon, ond hy ealle þa bliðe mode lustlice healdon woldon.

Ða eowde ic him sona þa ilcan boc þara regola; & of þam ilcan bocum tyn capitulas, þa ic geond stowe awrat & ic wiste þæt swiðost nedðearflecu wæron, sealde ic him, & bæd þæt heo ealle þa geornlice heoldon.
Is se æresta capitul: þæt we ealle gemænelice healdan þone halgan dæg Eastrena þy Drihtenlecan dæge æfter þæm feowerteogðan monan þæs ærestan monþes.
Se æftera is: þætte nænig biscop oðres biscopes scire inswoge, ac þætte he þoncful sy steore him þæs bibodenan folces.
Se þridda is: þætte þa mynster, þa þe Gode gehalgode syn, nænegum biscope alefed seo in ængum þinge heo unstillian, ne owiht of heora eahtum þurh nednyme ongeneman.

Se feorða is: þætte munecas ne leoren of stowe to oðerre, ne of mynstre to oðrum, nemne þurh leafnesse his agnes abbudes; ac þæt heo awunien in þære hersumnesse, þe hy Gode gehehton in þa tid heora gehwyrfnesse.
Þonne is se fifta: þæt nænig Godes þeow biscopes gefera forlæte his ægenne biscop, & geond missenlice stowe fere & eorne; ne he ower, þær he cyme, onfongen, sy, buton biscopes tacne oððe gewrite.
Gif he æne siða onfongen, haten ham hweorfan, ne wille, se þe hine feormade & se þe gefeormad wæs, seon heo begen biscopes dome scyldige.

Ðonne is se sexta: þætte elþeodige biscopas & Godes þeos seon þoncfulle heora gestliðnesse & feorme; & nængum heora alefed sy ænge sacerdlice þegnunge don buton þæs biscopes leafe, þe hy on his scire gefeormad syn.
Se seofoða is: þætte twigea on gere seonoð gesomnode.
Ac forþon missenlice intingan & unæmtan oft gelimpað, licade us eallum gemænelice, þætte inAgustus Kalendeæne siða on gere seonoð gesomnode in stowe, seo is nemned Clofeshoh.
Se eahtoða is: þætte nænig biscopa hine oðrum forbære þurh unrehte willunge, ac ealle ongete þa tide & endebyrdnesse his halgunge.
Se neogoða capitul wæs gemænelice asmead: þætte weaxendum þæm rime geleafsumra ma biscopa ætecte wæron.

Se teogoða is for gesinhigum: þætte nængum alefed sy nemne ælice gesinscipe habban; ne ænig mæghæmed ne unclæne fremme, ne nænig his agen wiif forlæte, nemne, swa þæt halig godspel læreð, for intingan dyrnre forlegenesse.

Gif hwelc mon his agnum wife wiðscufe, þæt him mid rehte æ forgifen & geþeoded wæs, gif he rihtlice cristen beon wille, ne gegaderie he hine to ængum oðrum, ac swa awunie oðþo wið his agen wiif geþwærie.

Wæs ðæs seonoð geworden þy geare ymb syx hund wintra & þreo & hundseofontig from Drihtnes menniscnesse, þy geare eac Ecgberht Contwara cyning forðferde in Iulius monðe: & Hloðhere his broðor feng to his rice, þæt he hæfde þreottyne winter & seofon monað.

Ðonne wæs Biise Eastengla biscop, þe we sægdon þætte in þæm foresprecenan seonoðe wære; wæs he Bonefatius æfterfylgend þæs biscopes, þæs we beforan gemyndgodon, se wæs micelre halignesse & æfestnisse mon.

Forðon þa Bonefatius forðferde æfter seofontyne gearum his biscophada, þa gehalgode Theodor biscop after him þone Biise to biscope; ond þa gena bi him lifgendum, þæt he wæs bewered from þære biscopþegnunge mid hefigre untrymnesse, wæron twegen biscopas Ecce & Beadowine fore hine gecorene & gehalgode.
Of þære tide oð to dæge seo mægð hafað twegen biscopas.
Æfter ðissum nales micelre tide forð aurnenre, wæs Theodor ærcebiscop abolgen from Wynferðe Mercna biscope þurh gewyrht sumre unhearsumnesse.
Þa benom he hine his biscopscire & on his stowe gehalgode Seaxwulf biscop, se wæs timbrend & abbud þæs mynstres, æt Medeshamstede is cweden, in Gyrwa londe.
Wynferþ hwearf to his mynstre, þæt is nemned æt Bearwe, & þær on godre drohtunge his lif geendade.
Þa eac swylce he gesette Eastseaxum Erconwald biscop in Lundenceastre.
Wæron heora cyningas in þa tiid Sebbe & Sighere, þara we beforan gemyndgodon.
Þæs biscopes lif & drohtunge in biscophade ge ær biscophade is sægd þætte wære þæt halgeste, swa swa eac swylce æfter mid heofonlicra mægena tacnum gecyðed wæs.

Ond forþon seoþþon longe his horsbær, þe hine mon untrumne on bær, wæs from his discipulum gehealden; & monige untrume, þa ðe in lenctenadle oðþo in oðerre hefignesse & untrumnesse gewergade <wæron>, þær æt hælo onfengon.

Ond nales þæt an þætte þa untruman, þa ðe under þa bære oðþo to gesette <wæron>, gehælde wæron, ac swelce eac þa scæfþan, þe ðær on genumene wæron, & to untrumum monnum gelædde, hræðe him læcedom gebæron & brohton.
Þes halga wer, ær þon þe he biscop geworden wære, tu æðele mynster he getimbrede, oðer him seolfum oðer æðelburge his sweostor, & æghwæðer þara regollecum þeodscipum wel gesette.

Him he getimbrade in Suðrigna lande bi Temese streame in stowe, seo is geceged Ceortes eig, his sweoster, in Eastseaxna mægðe in stowe seo is nemned in Bercingum, in þære heo meahte Gode wilsumra wifmonna lareow & festermodor gestondan.

Þa heo þa onfeng þæm gerece þæs mynstres, heo <efenwyrðe> heo in eallum þingum þæm biscope & hire breðer in rehtum life & in regollecum gegearwode, swa þætte eac swylce mid heofonlecum wundrum æfter gecyþed wæs.

Forðon in ðissum mynstre, þæt is in Bercingum, monig tacn gastlicra mægena gefremed wæron, þa ðe to gemynde & to timbernesse þara æfterfylgendra from monegum, þa ðe hit cuðon, awriten hæfd wæren, þa sumu woe nu gemdon geþeodan in þis user <ciriclice> stær.

Mid þy seo hreonis þæs oft cwedenan wooles feor & wide all wæs forhergende & forneomende, þa cwom he eac swylce in þone dæl þæs mynstre, þe ða wæpnedmen in wæron; ond dæghwamlice gehwær of weorulde to Drihtne genumene wæron.

Þa wæs seo abbudisse & seo modor þære gesomnunge bighygdig & sorgende, in hwylce tid þone dæl þæs mynstres, þe se þreat þara Godes þeowa in wifhada in wæs, þæt ilce wite gehrine, ða ongon heo gelomelice in gesomnunge þara sweostra secan & ascian, in hwelcre stowe þæs mynstres heo woldon, þæt heora liictun geseted wære, þæt heo mon bebyrgan meahte, þonne þæt gelumpe, þæt heo of middangearde genumene wæron þy ylcan gehrore, þe heo oðre gesegon.
Mid þy heo þa nænge cuðe ondswaro findan meahte, þeah þe heo georne sohte æt þæm sweostrum, þa gelomp, þæt heo seolfa mid eallum þæm swustrum þa cuðestan ondsware þære uplican foreseonesse onfeng.

Forþon sumre neahte, þa se sealmsong gefylled wæs þæs uhtlecan lofsonges, þa wæron ða Cristes þeowe utgongende of cirican to byrgenne þara broðra, þa ðe heo of þissum leohte foreeodon, & þær þa wunelecan lofsongas Drihtne sungon.

Þa wæs þær semninga heofonlic leoht onsended & cwom ofer heo ealle, ond swa swa micel scete heo ealle oferbrædde, & heo mid swa micelre fyrhtu & wafunge gesloh, þæt heo þone song, þe heo sungon, forhtiende forleton.
Wæs seo beorhtnes þæs onsendan leohtes mara, þon sunnan leoht bið æt middan dæge.
Þa wæs æfter medmiclum fæce, þæt hit wæs up ahæfen of þære stowe & gewat in suðdæl þæs mynstres, þæt is be westan þære cirican.

& þær þa sum fæc wunade, & him þa stowe wæs ontynende, þe heo ær ymbþeahtedon; & swa eallum geseondum up in heofonas gewat, þætte nængum heora tweo wæs, þætte þæt seolfe leoht þa sawle þara Cristes þeowa wæs gelædende & onfonde in heofonas, þætte þæt eac swylce þa stowe him æteawde, þær heora lichoman restan scoldon & æriste dæges bidan.

Þæs leohtes scima wæs swa micel, swa swa sum ald broðor on morgenne sægde, se ðe in þa ilcan tid in þære cirican mid oðre gingran breðer æt gebede wæs, cwæð he, þæt þæs leohtes scima þurh þa cinan þære dura & þurh þa <eagþyrel> ineode, þæt hit ealle beorhtnesse dæghwamlices leohtes oferswiðde.
Wæs in ðæm ilcan mynstre cneohtcild sum; ne wæs yldre þon þrywintre, wæs his noma æsica, se fore þære cildlecan eldo þa gena wæs in þara fæmnena mynstre Gode gehalgodra feded & <læred>.
Ða wæs he gehrinen mid þa foresprecenan aðle.

Ða he ða to þæm ytmæstan dogor bicwom, þa cleopode he ðriga & aane of þæm gehalgedum fæmnum Criste hire agne noman cegde, swa swa he hire ondweardre to spræce, & cwæð: Eadgyð, Eadgyð, Eadgyð; & swa wæs geendiende þis wilwendlice liif, & in þæt ece ineode.

Ond sona þa seo fæmne, þe he sweltende cegde, in þære stowe þe heo wæs, þære ilcan untrymnesse wæs gehrinen, & þy seolfan dæge, þe heo geceged wæs, of þeossum leohte wæs atogen: & þone wæs fylgende, se ðe hy cegde, to þæm heofonlecan rice.
Eft sumu of þæm ilcan Godes þeowum mid þa foresprecenan aðle wæs gestonden & to þæm uutmæstan dogor gelæded.

Þa ongon heo semninga on midde neaht cleopian þæm þe hire þegnodon; bæd þæt hy þæt blæcern & þæt leoht adwæscten, þæt þær inne onbærned wæs; & þæs heo gelomlice bæd & monade, & hire nænig hwæðre hyran wolde.
Ða æt nehstan cwæð heo: Ic wat þæt ge wenað, þæt ic ungewitge mode sprece.
Ac hwæðre witað ge þæt hit swa nis.
Forþon ic eow soð secgu, þæt ic geseo þis hus mid swa micle leohte gefylled, þætte þæt eower blæcern & leoht me is eallinga þeostre gesegen.
Ond ne þa gena, þeah þe heo þus spræce, hire ænig ondswarade oðþe geþafian wolde.
Cwæð heo eft: Bærnað nu eower blæcern & leoht, swa longe swa ge willen.
Weotað ge hwæðre þæt þæt nis min, forþon min leoht me to cymeð, þonne hit dagian onginneð.
Ongon him þa secgan, þæt hire æteawde sum halig wer, se þy ylcan geare forðferde, & hire cwæde to, þonne dagunge tid cwome, þæt heo wære to þæm ecan leohte ferende.
Þære gesyhðe soð wæs hraðe gecyðed & geseðed ymb þæs dæges upyrne in þære fæmnan deaðe & forðfore.
Mid ðy ða eac seo arfæste modor Gode þære leofan gesomnunge æðelburg abbudisse wæs of middangearde to geleoranne, ða æteawde sweoster wundorlic gesyhð, þære noma wæs Torhtgyð.

Seo monig ger in þæm ilcan mynstre wuniende wæs, & heo symle in ealre eaðmodnesse & in hluttornisse & in clænnisse geornlice Gode þeodde; ond wæs fultumend regollices þeodscipes þære ilcan moder & abbudissan, & þa geongran lærde & clænsade ge mid lare ge mid lifes bysene.

Þære <sweostor> mægen þæt æfter þæs apostolis cwide in untrymnesse gefremed wære, wæs heo semninga gehrinen mid hefigre untrymnesse lichoman, & þurh nigon ger full mid þa arfæstan foreseonisse ures alesendes swiþe swenced wæs, to þon þætte, swa hwæt swa in hire unclænes betweoh þa mægen þurh unwisnesse oððo þurh ungemænne gelumpe, þætte eal þæt se ofn þære singalan costunge asude.
Þeos sweostor sumre neahte, þa hit dagian ongon, wæs utgongende of hire cleofan, þe heo inwunade.
Þa geseah heo sweotole swa swa monnes lichoman mid scetan bewundenne, se wæs beorhtra þon sunne, in heanisse boren beon.
Wæs he ærest up ahefen of þæm huse, þe ða sweostor in reston.

Mid þy heo þa geornlecor bihealdende wæs, hwelcum teonde up ahefen wære se wlite þæs wulderlecan lichoman, þe heo sceawiende wæs, ða geseah heo, swa swa mid gyldnum rapum he in þa uplecan ahefen wære, oðþæt þe openiendum heofonum in gelæded wæs, & me from hire gesegen beon ne meahte.

Þa þohte heo bi þære gesyhðe; & hire nænig tweo wæs, þætte hwylchugu hraðe of þære gesomnunge sweltende wære, þære sawl þurh þa godan weorc & þa scinendan, þe heo dyde, swa swa þurh gyldne rapas to heofonum ahefen beon sceolde.
Þæt þa soðlice swa gelomp.
Forðon, nales monegum dagum betweoh gesettum, Gode seo leofe modor þære gesomnunge of hefignesse lichoman alæded wæs; & hire seo halige sawl þæs heofonlecan eðles ingong gestag.
Swylce eac in þæm ylcan mynstre wæs sum æðele nunne æfter þeosse worulde wyrðnisse, & in lufan þære toweardan weorulde micle æðelre.
Seo monegum gearum swa eallre þegnunge hire lichoman ofgefen & forlæten wæs, þæt heo nænig lim onstyrian meahte.
Þa heo þa geascade, þæt þære arwyrðan abbudissan lichoma wæs in cirican broht & geseted, oðþæt hine mon byrgan sceolde, þa bæd heo þæt hy mon þider gebære.

Þa ðæt þa swa wæs, þa onhelde heo to þam liice ond in gemet þara biddendra, swa swa heo to hire <lifigendre> spræce, bæd þæt heo funde & abæde æt þæs arfæstan sceppendes mildheortnesse, þæt heo from swa miclum clæmnessum & swa singalum onlesed beon moste.
Ne hire bene lator gehyrde wæron þon æfter twelf dagum, þæt heo wæs of lichoman gelæded, & for þæm hwilwendlecum geswencnessum ece mede & edlean onfeng.

Mid ðy ða þa seo foresprecene Cristes þeowe Torhtgyð þreo ger þa gena <æfter> þære hlafdigan forðfore in þissum life hæfd wæs, ond heo swa swiðe mid þa untrymnesse þe we forecwædon, soden wæs, þætte na þa baan an to lafe wæron: & æt nehstan, þa seo tid nealecte hire tolesnesse, nales þæt an oðerra leoma ac swylce eac þære tungan onstyrenesse biswicade.

Þa wæron þreo dagas & þreo neaht fulle, þæt heo wæs uncwisse, þa wæs heo semninga mid gastlicre gesihðe gereted, & hire muð & hire eagan ontynde & locade up in heofon & þus ongon sprecan to þære gesihðe, þe heo <bihealdende> wæs: Me is, cwæð heo, þin cyme on miclum ðonce; & þu eart leof wilcuma.
Þa heo þa ðis cwæð, þa geswigade heo hwon, swa swa heo bidende wære his ondsware, þone þe heo geseah & þæm þe heo tosprecende wæs.
Eft heo, swa swa heo leohtlice gebylged wære, æfter þon heo cwæð: Nænge þinga ic þas bliðe aberan mæg.
Eft heo midmicel fæc geswigade.
Cwæð þa ðriddan siðe: Gif hit nænge þinga to dæge beon mægge, ic halsio þætte ne sy long fæc bitweonum.

Swigade þa eft hwon, swa swa heo ær dyde, ond þa ðus þæt word betynde & geendade: Gif hit eallinga þus aræded seo, & þes cwide onwended beon ne mote, ic biddo & halsio þæt ne sy mare fæc betweonum, þon þeos nehste neaht an.
Þa heo þa þis cwæð, þa frugnon heo þa ymbsittendan, mid hwone heo sprecende wære.
Cwæð heo: Mid mine þa leofestan modor æðelburge.
Þa ongeton hy in þon, þæt heo to þon cwom, þæt heo hire sægde þa neahtide hire geleornesse.
& eac swa wæs, swa swa heo bæd: þa se dæg & seo niht forðgewat, þæt heo wæs onlesed from bendum hire lichoman & untrymnesse, & to gefean ineode ecre hælo.
Ða æfterfylgde æðelburge in abbudissan þegnunge seo wilsume Godes þeowe, þære noma wæs Hildelid.

Ond heo monig ger, þæt is oð ða ytmæstan elde hire, þam ilcan mynstre fromlice fore wæs æghwæðer ge in þara þinga foresceawunge, þa ðe to gemænum brocum belumpun, ge eac in gehælde regollices þeodscipes.

Þa licade hire fore nearonisse þære stowe, þe þæt mynster on getimbred is, þæt heo wolde þa baan up adon þara Cristes þeowa, þe ðær bebyrgede wæron, & in cirican gesettan þære eadigan fæmnan Sancta Marian & þær in anre stowe healdan.

Ond þær swiðe oft seoððan beorhtnes heofonlices leohtes æteawde; & eac oft micel swetnes wundorlices stences becwom, & monig oðer tacn & wundor æteawdon, þa mæg in þære bec gemetan, swa hwylc swa heo rædeð, þe we þas of alæson.
Þonne is sum wundor hælo, þe us nis to forlætenne, þe seo ilce booc sagað, þætte æt liictune geworden wære Gode þære leofan gesomnunge.
Wæs sum gesiið þær on neaweste.
Þa gestod his wiif untrymnes on hire eagum: & þa ðurh dagas þæt heo hefegedan & þeostrodon, þæt heo æt nehstan nænigne dæl leohtes sciman geseon meahte.

Mid þy heo þa sum fæc on þisse blindnisse wæs, þa wæs sumre neahte, þær heo betyned wunade, þætte hire becwom on mod, gif heo to þam mynstre gelæded wære Godes þara gehalgedra fæmnena, ond heo þær æt þara haligra reliquium hire gebede, þæt heo meahte þæt forlorene leoht eft onfon.
Ne heo þa ne ælde, ac sona gefylde þæt hire on mod becwom.
Þa wæs heo gelæded from hire þeowum & þignenum to þæm mynstre, þe þær neah wæs.
Þær heo wæs ondettende, þæt heo hæfde onwalgne geleafan hire hælo.
Þa wæs heo gelæded to liictune þara Godes þeowa; & mid þy heo þær longe gebegdum cneom hire gebæd, sona geearnode þæt hire bene geherde wæron.
Ond sona þæs þe heo fram þam bede aras, ær þon þe heo of þære stowe eode, þæt heo onfeng gife þæs bedenan leohtes.

Ond seo ær hire þeowa hondum þyder gelæded wæs, heo þa freo on hire fota gongum bliðe ham hweorfende wæs, efne þon gelicost, swa swa heo to ðon þæt wilwendlice leoht an forlete, þæt heo in hire hælo æteawde, hu micel leoht Cristes þa halgan in heofonum ahten, & hwylc gifu heora mægenes wære.
Þære tide Eastseaxna rice fore <wæs>, swa swa seo ilce boc sagað, Gode se wilsuma wer, þæs noma wæs Sebbe, þæs we beforan gemyndgodon.
Wæs he se mon æfest in his dædum & gelom in halgum gebedum & swiðe geornful in arfæstum wæstmum ælmessena; ond he sundorliif & munucliif wæs forebeorende allum þam weolum & arum þæs eorðlecan riices.
Þæt lif he oft & geara wolde geceosan & þæt eorðlice rice forlætan, gif him ne wiðstode þæt wiðerworde mod his wiifes.
Þonon monegum wæs gesewen & oft cweden, þætte swelces modes wer ma gedafonade beon to biscope gehalgad, þonne cyning wære.
Mid þy he ða þritig wintra in þæm rice awunade & wæs cempa þæs heofonlecan rices, þa wæs he lichomlicre untrymnesse micelre swiðe þread, & þære forðferde.
Ða monade he his wif, þæt heo þa gena ætgædre Gode þeowde, þa heo ma ætgædre ne meahton middangeard lufian ne middangearde þeowian.

Ða he þæt þa for his untrymnesse uneaðe þurhteah, þa cwom he to Lundenceastre biscope, þæs noma wæs Waldhere, se wæs ærconwaldes biscopes æfterfylgend; ond þurh his bletsunge þone æfestnesse had underfeng, þone he longe ær wilnade.
Swylce he brohte þæm ilcan biscope micel feoh & unlytel þearfum to gedælanne; ond þæs ealles nowiht him seolfum wæs gehaldende, ac he ma wilnade þearfan gaste wunian for heofona rices lufan.

Mid þy he ða hefgad wæs mid þa foresprecenan untrymnesse, & he onget þæt him deaðes dæg toweard wæs, þa ongon þæs cynelecan modes monn him ondrædan, þonne he to deaðe cumende wære & mid micle sare wæced þy læs he owiht unwyrþes oðþe ungerisnes dyde mid his muþe, oðþe mid oðerra lima styrenesse.

Gehet him þa to þære foresprecenan Lundenceastre biscop, in þære he ða wunade; bæd hine þæt he him forgefe, þonne he forðferan scolde, þæt þær ma monna inne ne wære, þonne se biscop & twegen his þegna.
Þa gehet se biscop, þæt he leoflice swa gedyde, swa he hine bæd, þa wæs æfter medmiclum fæce, þætte se ilca Godes wer his leomu in stilnesse gesette & hine gerestan wolde, & onslepte.
Þa geseah he frefrende gesihðe, seo him ealle þa nearonesse þære gemyndgadan sorge afyrde, ond eac swelce him æteawde, hwelce dæge he sceolde þis hwilwendlice lif geendian.
Geseah he, swa swa he seolfa eft æfter sægde, þry wæpnedmen to him cuman mid beorhtum hræglum gegyrede.
Þara wæs an gesittende beforan his reste, & stodon his geferan oðre, þa ðe mid him cwomon.
Þa frugnon heo þone sittendan bi his stealle, hu be him geweorðan scolde, þone þe hy untrumne neosian cwomon.
Cwæð he, þætte sawl butan ængum sare & mid micle beorhtnesse leohtes wære utgongende of lichoman: & him eac cyðde & sægde, þæt he þy þriddan dæge forðferan sceolde.
Æghwæþer þara þinga swa gefylled wæs, swa he of þære gesyhðe geleornade.
Forðon æfter þy þriddan dæge, gefylleddre nontide, þa semninga wæs, swa swa he leohtlice onslepte, buton ænigre gefelnisse sares þone gast onsende & forðgeleorde.
Þa gearwodon heo his lichoman to byrgenne stænenne þruh.
Þa heo þa ongunnon þone lichoman þær insettan, þa wæs se lichoma sponne lengra þære þryh.
Ða heowon heo þone stan, swa swiðe swa heo meahton, & toætecton lengeo þære þryh twegra fingra gemet.
Ac ne ða gen swa þætte heo þone lichoman neoman meahte.
Þa wæs micel uneðelicnes geworden bi his byrgennesse, þa þohton heo & spræcon, þæt hy oðþe oðre þruh sohton oððe þone lichoman on cneom gebegde, to þon þæt heo hine þær in gedon meahton.
Ac þa wundorlicwise & efne heofonlic wæs geworden, þætte bewerede þætte nohwæðer þissa beon sceolde.
Stod se biscop & þæs cyninges suna twegen æt þæm lice, Sigeheard & Swefred, þa æfter him to rice fengon, & eac micelu mengeo manna.

Ða wæs semninga gemeted seo þruh gerisenre lenge to gemete þæs lichoman, to þon þætte from dæle þæs heafdes eac swylce meahte wongere betweoh geseted beon; & from dæle þara fota feower fingra gemet seo þruh wæs þæm lichoman lengre.
Þa wæs se Godes mon bebyrged in Sancte Paules cirican þæs apostoles, þæs monungum he gelæred wæs & geleornade, þæt he ða heofonlecan eadignesse gehyhte.
Se feorða biscop Westseaxna Leutherius wæs haten.
Se æresta wæs Birinus; se æftera wæs ægelberht; þridda wæs Wine.
Þa Cenwalh se cyning forðferde, in þæs rice se ilca Leutherius wæs biscop geworden, þa fengon aldormen to þæm rice þære þeode, & betweoh him todældon, & tyn ger hæfdon.
& in heora rice Leutherius se biscop forðferde; ond Theodor biscop fore hine gehalgode Hædde to biscope in Lundenceastre.
On þæs biscopes tide wæron oferswiðde & geflymde þa aldormen: ond Ceadwalla feng to Westseaxna rice.

& mid þy he tu ger rice hæfde & cyning wæs, þa wæs he inbryrded mid lufan þæs uplecan rices & þæt eorðlice forlet in þæs ilcan biscopes tid, & to Rome ferde & þær his lif geendade, swa swa hereæfter is swutolecor to secgenne.

Þa wæs ymb syx hund wintra & syx & hundseofontig æfter Drihtnes menniscnesse, þætte æðelred Mercna cyning gelædde wærge weorod, & Cent forhergode, & cirican & mynster buton gesihðe arfæstnesse oðþe Godes egsan hwyrfde & fornom: ond Hrofesceastre eac swelce, in þære wæs Putta biscop, þeah þe he in ða tid þær ondweard ne wære, he mid gemæne hergunge fornom.
Ða he ða þæt onfond, þæt his cirice eallum hire æhtum wæs bereafod & forhergad, þa cerde he to Seaxwulfe Mercna biscope: & he him gesealde sumre cirican eahte & medmicel lond.
Ond he in þære cirican Gode þeowode, & swa hwyder ymb swa he beden wæs, ferde & ciricsong lærde; & þær in sibbe his lif geendade.
For þæm Theodor biscop in Hrofesceastre Quichelm to biscope gehalgode; ac he æfter medmicelre tide for wæðelnesse weoruldgoda from þæm biscopseðle gewat.
He ða Gefmund for hine to biscope gesette.

Þa wæs ymb tu ger, þæs þe æðelred Mercna cyning Centlond forhergode, þæt is þæt nigoðe ger Ecgfriðes rices þæs cyninges, ða æteawde in Agustus monðe neowe steorra, se is cweden cometa; & þreo monað wæs awuniende, & in uhttide wæs upeornende & micelne sciman wæs beorende swa swa scinendes leges.
Ðy ylcan gere wæs towestnis & unsib geworden betweoh Ecgfrið cyning & þone arwyrðan biscop Wilferð.
& se ilca biscop wæs ascofen & adrifen of his biscopseðle, ond twegen biscopas on his stowe gesette, þa ðe Norðanhymbra þeode fore wæron, þæt wæs Boosa, se styrde <Dera> mægðe, & Eata Beornicea.
Hæfde Bosa in Eoforwiicceastre seðl, ond Eata in Eagostaldes ea & in Lindisfarona ea: wæron heo begen of munuchade in biscophad gecorene.
Mid þæm wæs eac Eadhæd in Lindisse mægðe to biscope gehalgod, þa neowan Ecgfrið se cyning geeode, þa he oferswiðde & geflymde Wulfhere in gefeohte.
Ond seo ilce mægð ærest þeosne biscop agenne onfeng.
Se æftera wæs æðelwine; se þridda Eadgar; se feorða Cyneberht.
Hæfde seo mægð ær Eadhæðe Seaxwulf biscop, se eac swelce wæs Mercna biscop & Middelengla.
Ac he wæs of Lindessse adrifen, þa Ecgfrið heo geeode, & in þara oðerra mægða gerece awunade.
Wæron gehalgode in Eoforwic, Eadhæð, Boosa, & Eata from Theodore biscope.

Ond he ða eac swylce æfter þrim gearum wilferðes onweggewitenesse þissa rime twegen biscopas toætecte, Trumberht to cirican Heagostealdes ea & Eata hwearf to Lindesfarona ea & Trumwine to Peohta mægðe, seo in þa tid wæs Ongolcynrice underþeoded.
Eadhæð he gesette to biscope Hrypsetna cirican, þa he of Lindesse hwearf, forðon þa æðelred Mercna cyning þa mægðe onfeng & beget.
Ða Wilferð biscop adrifen wæs of his biscopscire & longe geond monige stowe ferende wæs, & he Rome gesohte & eft hwearf to Breotone.
Ond þeah þe he for feondscipum þæs gemyndgedan cyninges in his eðel oððe in his biscopscire onfongen beon ne meahte, ne meahte he hwæðre from þære þegnunge beon bewered godspel to lærenne.
Ac he cerde to Suðseaxna mægðe, seo æfter Contwarum suð & west belimpeð to Westseaxna gemære.
Is þæs londes seofon þusendo, ond heo þære tide þa gena hæðnum bigongum þeowdon.
Þisse þeode se biscop Cristes geleafan word & fulwihtebæþ þegnade.
Wæs æðelwalh þære þeode cyning noht micelre tide ær in Mercum gefulwad þurh Wulfheres lare & geornfulnisse Mercna cyninges.
Eac swelce þa he æt fulwihte bæðe onþwegen wæs, him to godsuna onfeng, ond to tacne þære sibbe him twa mægðe forgeaf, þæt is Wihte ealond & Meanware mægðe in Westseaxna þeode.
Wæs he se cyning swiðe gefeonde in þæs biscopes cyme.
Ond he ærest ealdormen þære mægðe & cyninges þegnas mid þa halgan wyllan þwoh fulwihtes bæðes; ond mæssepreostas Eappa & Peadda & Burghelm & Oidde þæt oðer folc ge þa ge æfterfylgendre tide fulwadon.
Seo quen þonne, þære noma wæs æbbe, in hire mægðe, þæt is in Hwiccum, wæs gefulwad.
Wæs heo Eanfriðes dohtor Eanheres broðor, þa begen wæron Cristne mid heora folce.
Ac eal seo mægð suðseaxna wæs unwis þæs godcundan noman & geleafan.
Wæs þær sum munuc of Scotta cynne, se wæs Dicul haten; hæfde he medmicel mynster sum in þære stowe, þe is nemned Bosanham.
Wæs mid wuda & mid sæ ymbsald, & in þæm wæron fif gebroðor oððe syxe in þearfendum life & earmlecum Drihtne þeowiende.
Ac nænig mon in þære mægðe ne heora lif onhyrgan wolde ne heora lare gehyran.
Ond þa Wilferð biscop in þære þeode godcunde lare lærde, nales þæt an þætte from yrmðum ecre niðrunge, ac swylce eac from þæm manfullan wæle hwilwendlicre forwyrde generede.
Forþon þrym gearum ær his cyme in þa mægðe þæt þær nænig regn in þæm stowum cwom; & þonon se grimmesta hungor þæt folc wæs <wæcende>, & heo mid arleasre cwale fylde wæron.

Þæt is to tacne: secgað men, þætte oft feowertig monna oðþe fiftig somed, þa ðe mid þy hungre gewæcte wæron, þæt heo earmlice bi hondum noman & ealle ætgædre of sæs ofre ut feollan, & woldon heo sylfe oðþe offyllan oðþe adrencan.
Ond þa þy sylfan dæge, ðe seo þeod Cristes geleafan onfeng & fulwihte, þa astah & cwom smolt regn & micel & genihtsum; & þa lond greowon & blostmedon, ond æfter cwom god gear & wæstmbeorende.

Ond swa awurpon þa aldan dysignesse & deofolgild onscunedon, ond ealra heora heortan & lichoman wynsumedon in þone lifgendan God; & þone ongeton, se ðe soð God is, ond þæt heo seolfe wæron ge on þæm nearran godum, ge on þæm utteran mid heofonlice gife gewelgade.
Forðon se biscop, mid þy þe he in þa mægðe cwom & swa micel wite hungres þær geseah, lærde he ða þæt hie in fiscaðe him ondlifene sohton; forþon ðe æghwæðer ge sio sæ ge hiora ea fiscum genyhtsumade.
Ac sio ðeod þone cræft þæs fiscaþes ne cuðe, nemne to ælum anum.
Ða gesomnodon þa bisceopes men þa ælnet æghwonan þe hie meahton, & sendon in ðone sæ.
& seo godcunde giofu him gefultumade þæt hie sona gefengon þreo hund fisca missenlicra cynna.
Ond ða in þreo todældon: hundteontig hie sealdon þearfum, hundteontig þæm ðe þa net ahton; hundteontig hy him selfum to nytte dydon.
Þære fremsumnesse se bisceop ealra hiora heortan in his lufan gecerde: ond ðy neodlicor þurh his lare þa heofonlican god gehyhton, þæs ðenunge hie ða hwilwendlican god namon & onfengon.
Ðære tide æþelwalh se cyning geaf & sealde ðæm arwyrðan bisceope Wilferþe seofon & hundeahtatig hida londes, ðæs noma is Sylesea, þæt he meahte his men on gehabban þa þe mid him wraccdon.
Is sio stow æghwonan mid sæ ymbseald butan westan; ðonan hit hafað ingang, swa micelre brædo swa mon mæge mid liðeran geweorpan.
Mid ðy he þa se bisceop þa stowe onfeng, þa gestaþelode he þær mynster ond þæt to regollife gesette swiþust of þam broðrum, þe he mid him brohte.
Þæt git to dæge his æfterfylgend bisceopas habbað & agon.
Þenode se arwyrða bisceop Wilferð in ðæm dælum ða bisceopðenunge arwyrðlice fif gear, þæt is oð Ecgferþes deað þæs cyninges.

Ond forðon him æþelwalh se cyning mid æhte þære foresprecenan stowe ealle ða spede þe þær on wæron mid lande ond mid monnum sealde & forgeaf, ond he ealle on Cristes geleafan gesette & mid fulwihte bæþe aþwoh.
Betwih ða twa & hundteontig & fiftig þara manna esna ond menena gefulwade; & ealle ða swa swa he þurh fulwihte from deofles ðeowdome gehælde, & eac swilce mennisce ðeowdome onlesde & hie gefreode.
Betwih þas ðing þa wæs cumende Ceadwalla mid weorode Westseaxna æþeling, geong & from, þa he wreccea wæs, ond ofsloh æþelwalh ðone cyning & þa mægþe mid grimme wæle & herige ongebræc.
Ac he wæs sona ðonon adrifen from ðæs cyninges ealldormonnum Berhthune & Andhune, þa syððan þære mægþe rice hæfdon.
Þara se ærra wæs fram þam ylcan Ceadwala ofslegen, þa he Westseaxna cyning wæs, & þa mægþe mid hefigran þeowdome gehnægde.
Swylce eac Ine, se ðe æfter Ceadwalan to rice feng, gelicre geswencednesse monigra geara tide þa mægþe yfelade.
For þære wisan wæs geworden þæt eallre þære tide hi agenne bysceop habban ne mihton.
Ac þa Willferð bysceop wæs eft ham gelaðad, heora se æresta bisceop, syððan hie Westseaxna bysceopum underþeodde wæron, þa þe wæron on Wintaceastre.
Æfter þon þa þe Ceadwala wæs gemægenad & gestrongod on Westseaxna rice, þa geeode he eac & onfeng Wiht þæt ealond, þæt eal wæs oð þa tid deofolgildum geseald.
Ond he gelice þy troiscan wæle ealle þa londbigengan wolde ut amærian & his agenra leoda monnum gesettan.

Secgað men, þæt he eac wære mid gehate hine seolfne bindende þeah þe he ða gena in Criste ne wære eft acenned þurh fulwihtes bæð, þæt gif he þæt ealond gegan meahte, þæt he his þone feorðan dæl & þære herehyðe for Gode gesealde.
& he þæt swa gelæste, þæt þone dæl he Wilferðe biscope for Gode gesealde to brucenne, se in þa tid of his þeode þider cwom & þær ondweard wæs.
Is þæs ilcan ealondes gemet æfter Ongolcynnes eahte twelf hund hida.
& he þa þam biscope gesealde in æht þreo hund hida, & þær eahta to.
Ond he þa þone dæl, þe he onfeng, bebead sumum his preosta, þæs noma wæs Berhtwini, se wæs his sweostor sunu.
Ond he sealde him mæssepreost, þæs noma wæs Hiddila, se eallum þæm þa ðe woldon gehælde beon Godes word & fulwihte bæð þegnode.

Nis þonne no to forswigienne, ðætte in fruman þa ðe of þam ilcan ealonde þurh geleafan gehælde wæron, twegen cynelice cneohtas þa mid synderlicre Godes gife wæron gesigefæste, þa wæron Aarwaldes broðor þæs ealondes cyninges.
Ða Ceadwalla se cyning mid þy here in þæt ealond for, þa flugon þa cneohtas ut of þæm ealonde, & wæron gelædde in þa neahmægðe, seo is gecegd Eota lond, in sume stowe seo is nemned æt Stane.
Woldon heo & wendon, þæt heo þær meahton deagle & beholene beon from onsyne þæs unholdan cyninges.
Him ða wæron heo þær gemeldode; & se cyning heo ofslean het.

Ða þæt þa gehyrde sum abbud & mæssepreost, þæs noma wæs Cyneberht, se hæfde þonon noht feor sum mynster in þære stowe, þe is geceged Hreodford, þa cwom he to þæm cyninge, se ða in þæm ilcan dælum deagollice læcnod wæs from his wundum, þa ðe him gedonne wæron, þa he feaht & wonn on Wiht ðæt ealond.
Ond hine bæd, gif þa cneohtas aninga ofslegene beon sceoldon, þæt he him alefde & forgefe, þæt he moste heo gelæran in þa gerynu þæs cristnan geleafan.
Þa forgef se cyning him þæt & alefde.
Ond he ða heo intimbrede & gelærde mid soðfæstnesse worde & mid fulwihtes bæðe heo from synnum aðwoh: & heo gewisse gedyde & gelærde bi ingonge þæs ecan rices.
Ond se quellere him oferstod: & heo sona unforhte & bliðe underhnigon þone wilwendlecan deað, þurh þone heo ne tweodon ferende beon to þæm ecan rice heora sawla.
Ono þisse endebyrdnesse, æfter þon þe ealle Breotone mægðe Cristes geleafan onfengon, onfeng eac Wiht þæt ealond.
Hwæðre in þæm nænig for ermþo þære utlecan underþeodnesse onfeng biscoplicre þegnunge had ær Daniele, se þa wæs Westseaxna biscop.
Is þis ealond geseted ongegn midle Suðseaxna & Westseaxna; is sæ betweoh geseted þreora mila brad, se is gecegd Soluente.

In þæm sæ beoð twegen sæflodas, þa ðe ymb Breotone of þæm ungeendedan norðgarsecge becumað & astigað: & dæghwamlice him betweoh feohtende ongen cumað, & geendade þy compe in þone sæ eft togotene hweorfað, þonon heo ær cwomon.
Þissum tidum gehyrde Theodor biscop þone geleafan þære cirican Constantinopoli þurh gedwolan Euticetis swiðe gedrefde beon.
Ond he ða wilnade, þæt he Ongolþeode cirican, þæm he ða fore wæs, from þisses gemetes woole clæne awunade.
Ond gesomnedum þreate arwyrðra biscopa & monigra lareowa <on> syndrige frægn & ascode, hwylces geleafan heo wæren; ond mid anmodre geþafunge ealra heo on rehtum geleafan gemette.
& þeosne geleafan he gemde bebeodan & gefæstnian mid seonoðlecum stafum to intimbernesse & to gemynde þara æfterfylgendra.
Þara stafa & gewrites is þes fruma.

In nomine Domini nostri Ihesu Cristi Saluatoris:in noman usses Drihtnes Hælendes Cristes, ricsiendum ussum þam arfæstan hlafordum Ecgfriðe Norðanhymbra cyninge þy tegðan gere his rices, under þæm fiftegðan dægeKalendarum Octobris, þy eahteðan indictione, ond æðelrede Mercna cyninge þy syxtan geare his riices, & Ealdulfe Eastengla cyninge þy seofonteogeðan geare his rices, ond Hlothere Contwara cyninge his rices þy seofeðan geare; foresittendum Theodore mid Godes gife ærcebiscope Breotone ealondes & Contwara burge ceastre; ætgædre mid hine sittendum oðrum biscopum Breotone ealondes arwyrðum werum; ond foregesettum þæm swiðe halgum godspellum in þære stowe, þe is nemned Hæðfeld; ætgædre we wæron smeagende rehtne geleafan & rehtwuldriende.
We asetton, swa swa usser Drihten Hælende Crist in menniscum lichoman sealde his discipulum, ða ðe hine ondweardlice gesegon & gehyrdon his word.
Ond he sealde haligra fædra herebeacen,id est Credo;ond gemænelice ealle halige & ealle seonoðas & ealle þreat gecorenra lareowa þære rehtgelefdan cirican.
Ðas we seondon arfæstlice fylgende & rihtwuldriende; æfter heora lare þa ðe wæron godcundlice inbryrde, geþwærelice we gelyfað ondettende.

Ond we ondettað æfter halgum fædrum swæslice & soðlice, Fæder & Sunu & Haligne Gast, þrignisse in Annisse efenspedelice, ond Annesse in þære þrignesse, þæt is ænne God in þreom astondnessum oðþo hadum <efenspedelecum> efenlices wuldres & aare.
Ond þisses gemetes men æfter setton & spræcon, þa ðe belumpon to ondetnesse rihtes geleafan.

& þas swelce eac toætecte se halga seonoð his stafum: We onfengon þa halgan fif seonoðas & þa rehtgelefdan eadigra fædra & Gode ondfengra: þæt is ða ðe in Nicena gesomnade wæron, þreo hund biscopa & eahtatyne wið þæm arleasum Arreum eretici & his lare; ond in Constantinopoli wæron gesomnade hundteontig & fiftig biscopa wið wedenheortnisse <Macedones> & Eodoxæ & heora lare; ond in Efessum tu hundteontig biscopa wið þone wyrrestan Nestorium & his lare; ond in Calcidone syx hund biscopa & þritig wið Eotycem & Nestorium & his lare; ond eft in Constantinopoli se fifta seonoð wæs gesomnad, in Iustinianes tide þæs geongran caseres, wið þeodorum & Theodoreti & Iiba þæm ereticum & heora larum.
Ond we onfengon eac þone seonoð, se wæs geworden in Rome byrig in Martinus tiide þæs eadgan papan, þy nigoðan gere Constantines rice þæs arfæstan caseres.
Ond we wuldriað usserne Drihten Hælendne Crist, swa swa þas wuldredon, noht toætecende oðþe onweg ateonde þæs þe heo wuldredon.

Ond we amænsumiað mid heortum & mid muðe, þa ðe heo amænsumedon: ond þa ðe heo onfengon, we eac swelce onfoð, wuldriende God Fæder butan fruman, & his Sunu þone acennedan of Fæder, acennedne ær worulde, & Haligne Gast forð leorendne of Fæder & Suna unasecgendlice, swa swa þa bodedon & lærdon, þa ðe we bufan gemyndgodon, þa halgan apostole & witgan & lareowas.
Ond we ealle mid Cristes rodetacne fæstnodon & underwreoton, we þa ðe asetton þone allican geleafan & þone rihtan mid Theodore ærcebiscope.

Wæs eac swylce in þæm seonoðe, & ætgædre trymede þa domas þæs ilcan geleafan se arwyrða wer Iohannes, Sancte Petre cirican þæs apostolis heahsongere & abbud Sancte Martines mynstres, se neowan cwom from Rome þurh hæse Agothones þæs papan.
Wæs him latteow se arwyrða abbud, þe mon heht Benedictus.

Mid þy se ilca Benedictus mynster getimbrode in Breotone in are Sancte Petres þæs aldorapostoles in þære stowe, þe mon hateð æt Wiramuþan, þa cwom he to Roome mid his efnwyrhtan & geferan þæs ilcan weorces Ceolferð, se æfter him þæs ilcan mynstres abbud wæs.
Wæs his gewuna, þæt he eac oft ær on þære fore wæs.
Ond he arwyrðlice from þære eadgan gemynde Agothones þæs papan onfongen wæs.

Ond he bæd & onfeng in trymnesse þæs mynstres freodomes from him, þe he geworhte, priuilegium of þære apostolican aldorlicnesse getrymede, æfter þon þe he wisse þæt Ecgfriþes willa wæs þæs cyninges ond his leafnes wæs.
Forþon þe him þa londare forgeaf & sealde, þe he þæt mynster on getimbrade.
Þa onfeng he eac þone foresprecenan abbud Iohannem & in Breotone gelædde, þæt he sceolde in his mynstre þone song læran to twelf monþum, þe he æt Sancte Petre geleornade.
Þa dyde he Iohannes, swa þæs papan bebod wæs; endebyrdnesse & þeaw þæs songes cwicre stæfne þæs foresprecenan mynstres <sangeras> lærde.

& þa þe se hring ealles geares in weorðunge symbeldaga abædde, eac swilce stafum awrat & on bec gesette, seo in þam ilcan mynstre oð þis is gehealden, ond from monegum siððan oft gehwider emb writen wæs.

Swylce he Iohannes eac oðer bebod from þæm apostolican papan onfeng, þæt he þæt sceolde geornlice gewitan & geleornian, hwylces geleafan Ongolcynnes cirice wære, & him þæt gesægde, þonne he eft to Rome hwurfe.
For þære wisan wæs se seonoð gesomnad in Breotone, þe we ær sægdon.
& þa wæs gemeted in eallum ungewemmed geleafa & riht; ond him wæs seald seo bysen on gewrite þæs seonoðes, þæt he sceolde to Rome lædan.
Þa he þa wæs to his ylde hweorfende, þa æfter medmiclum fæce þæs þe he sæ oferfaren hæfde, þa wæs he gehrinen mid untrymnesse & forðferde.
& his lichoma from his freondum & for Sancte Martines lufan wæs to Turnan gelæded, & þær arwyrðlice bebyrged in þæm mynstre, þe he fore wæs in abbuddome.

Ond þeah þe he in þam siðfæte forðferde, nohte þon læs seo bysen þæs rihtan geleafan Ongelcirican to Rome gelæded wæs, ond from þæm apostolican papan & allum, þe þe hine gehyrdon oðþe reordan, þancwyrðlice wæs onfongen.
Onfeng Ecgfrið se cyning gemæccan & wif, þære noma wæs æðeldryð, Annan dohtor Eastengal cyninges, þæs we oft ær gemyndgodon.
Wæs se mon god & æfest, & þurh eal ge on mode ge on dædum æðele.
Brohte heo ær oðer wer him to wife Suðgyrwa aldormon, þæs noma wæs Tondberht; ac æfter medmiclum fæce, þæs þe he hy to wife onfeng, he forðferde.
Þa wæs heo seald & forgifen þæm foresprecenan cyninge.

Þæs gemanan myd þy heo wæs twelf winter brucende, hwæðre heo mid ecre onwalhnesse mægðhades wuldorlice awunade; swa swa me seolfum frinendum, mid þy sumum monnum cwom in tweon hwæðer hit swa wære, þa þære eadgan gemynde Wilferþ biscop sægde; & cwæð, þæt he wære se cuðesta geweota hire clænnisse & hire mægðhades, to ðon þætte Ecgfrið se cyning him geheht ge lond ge micel feoh to gesyllenne, gif he ða cwene gesponan & gelæran meahte, þæt heo brucan wolde his gesynscypes; forþon he geare wiste þæt heo nænigne wæpnedmon ma lufade þonne hine.

Nis þæt to geortrywanne, þæt in usse eldo þæt beon meahte, þætte forðgongendre eldo oft geworden getreow spell cyðað & secgað, þurh anes Drihtnes gife & þæs ilcan, se ðe hine gehatende wæs mid us eac <wunian> aa oð weorulde ende.
Wæs eac swelce þæs godcundan wundres sweotol tacnung, þæt þære ilcan fæmnan lichoma bebyrged brosnian ne meahte, þæt heo from werlicre hrinenesse ungewemmed awunade.
Bæd heo swiðe longe þone cyning, þæt heo moste weoruldsorge & gemænne forlætan, & heo forlete in mynstre þæm soðan cyninge Criste þeowian.
Þæt heo þa æt nehstan ma þurhteah, ða eode heo in æbban mynster þære abbudissan, seo wæs Ecgfriðes faðe þæs cyninges; þæt is geseted in þære stowe, þe mon nemneð Coludis byrig.
& heo þær haligrefte onfeng & Godes þeowhade from þæm foresprecenan biscope Wilferðe.
Þa wæs emb an ger æfter þissum þæt heo wæs abbudisse geworden, in þæm þeodlonde þe is geceged Elige, þær heo mynster getimbrode Gode wilsumra fæmnena.
& heo fæmne monigra modor ongon beon, ge mid bysenum heofonlices lifes ge eac mid monungum.
Secgað men be hire, seoðþan heo mynster gesohte, þæt heo næfre linnum hræglum brucan wolde ac wyllenum.
Ond seldon in hatum baðum heo baðian wolde, buton þam hyhstan symbelnessum & tidum æt Eastran & æt Pentecosten & þy twelftan dege ofer Geochol.
& þonne heo ærest þurh hire þegnunge & hire þinenna þa oðre Cristes þeowas, þa ðe þær wæron, & onþwegne, þonne wolde heo ealra nyhst hy baþian & þwean.
& seldon, buton maran symbelnessum & tidum oðþe maran nydþearfe, ma þonne æne siðe on dæge þæt heo wolde mete þycgan.
& symle, gif hire hefigre untrymnesse ne bewere, of þære tide uhtsanges oð hluttorne dæg in cirican in halgum gebedum stod.

Sume men eac swylce sægdon, þæt heo þurh witedomes gast þa adle forecwæde, þe heo on forðferde; ond swelce eac þara Godes þeawa <rim>, þa ðe of heora mynstre of middangearde wæron to geleorenne, þæt heo sweotolice eallum cyðde.
Þa geleorde heo to Drihtne on middum hire hiwum æfter seofon gearum, þæs þe heo abbudessan had onfeng.
Ond þa, gelice swa swa heo bebead, nales in oðre stowe butan in middum hire hiwum æfter endebyrdnesse, þe heo geleorde, in treowenre þryh wæs bebyrged.
Þa feng æfter hire in þa þegnunge abbudissan Seaxburh hire sweostor, þa hæfde to wife ærconbyrht Contwara cyning.
Ond mid þy æðeldryð wæs syxtyne gear bebyrged, þa licode <þære> abbudissan hire mægan, þæt heo hire ban up adyde & in neowe þruh gesette & in circan gedyde.
Þa heht heo sume broðor faran & þone stan secan, þæt mon meahte þa ðruh of geheawan & gewyrcan.
Þa eodon heo in scip, forþon Elia lond is æghwonan mid wætrum & mid fennum ymbseald, ne hit micele stanas hafað.
Þa cwomon heo to sumre ceastre gehrorenre noht feor þonon, seo is on Englisc Grantacester geceged.
& heo sona gemetton bi þære ceastre wallum þruh of hwitum stane fægere geworhte, & seo wæs swilce eac gerisenlice gehleodad mid gelice stane.
Þa ongeton heo sona, þæt heora ærende wæs & heora siðfæt from Drihtne seolfum gehradod & gesyndgad; & heo þæs Gode þanc sægdon, & þa þruh to þæm mynstre gelæddon.

Mid þy þa se lichoma þære halgan fæmnan & þære Cristes bryde openre þære byrgenne wæs forð on leoht gelæded, þa wæs he gemeted swa ungebrosnad & swa ungewemmed, swa heo þy ylcan dæge forðfered & bebyrged wære; swa swa se foresprecena biscop Wilferð & monige oðre, þa ðe hit cuðon, cyðdon & sægdon.
Ac hwæðre cuðran gewitnesse Cyneferð læce, se æt hire wæs, þa heo forðferde & eft þa hire lichoman mon of byrgenne uphof.
Wæs his gewuna þæt he sægde, þa heo untrumu wæs, þæt heo hæfde micelne swile on hire sweoran.
Þa heht me mon, cwæð he, þæt ic þone swile gesticade, þætte seo sceðþende wæte ut fleowe, seo þær in wæs.
Mid þy ic þæt þa dyde, þa wæs heo gesegen þurh twegen dagas, þæt hire leohtor & wel wære, swa þætte monige tealdon, þæt heo gehæled beon meahte from þære untrymnesse.
Þa þy þriddan dæge heo wæs eft hefigad mid þæm ærrum sarum, & sona wæs gerisen & genumen of middangearde, & eal þæt sar & þone deað mid ecre hælo & liife onwænde.
Mid þy þa æfter swa monegum gearum hire lichoma wæs of byrgenne up ahæfen, þa aþenedon heo & aslogon geteld ofer, & eal seo gesomnung broðra & sweostra on twa healfe singende ymbstodon.
Ond seo abbudisse in þæt geteld eode & fea monna mid heo, þæt heo þa ban woldon up adon & inþwean & gefeormian æfter monna gewunan.
Þa semninga gehyrdon we þa abbudissan inne hludre stefne cleopian: Seo wuldor, cwæð heo, Drihtnes noman.
Ða æfter medmiclum fæce þa cleopode me mon & cegde in.
Onwreogon þa duru þæs geteldes; þa geseah ic lichoman þære halgan Godes fæmnan up ahefenne of byrgenne & on bedde gesetedne: & wæs slæpendum men gelicra þonne deadum.
Þa onwreogon heo eac hire ondwlitan & eowdon me ða wunde þæs snides, þe ic geo ær dyde.

Ða wæs heo fæstlice gehalad, þætte wundorlice gemete for openre wunde & geoniendre, mid þa heo bebyrged wæs, þa seo þynneste dolgswæð & seo læsseste æteawde; ge eac ealle þa scytan, þe se lichoma mid bewunden wæs, swa onwalge & swa neowe & swa clæne æteawdon, swa swa þy seolfan dæge hire þæm clænum leomum ymbseald wæron.

Secgað eac men, þa heo þrycced wæs & swenced mid swile & sare hire swiran, þæt heo wære swiðe lustfulliende þisse untrymnesse cynne, & heo gewunalice cwæde oft: Ic wat cuðlice, þæt ic be gewyrhtum on minum sweoran bere þa byrðenne þisse aðle & þisse untrymnesse, in þæm ic gemon mec geo beran, þa ic geong wæs, þa iidlan byrðenne gyldenra sigila.

Ond ic gelyfo, þætte me forðon seo uplice arfæstnis wolde mec hefigade beon mid sare mines sweoran, þæt ic swa wære onlesed þære scylde þære swiðe idlan leasnisse, mid þy me nu for golde & for gimmum of swiran forð hlifað seo readnis & bryne þæs swiles & wærces.
Hwæt þa gelomp mid þa gehrinenisse þara ilcena gegyrelena, þe mon of hire lichoman dyde, þætte deofulseoce men & monige oðerre untrymnesse oft gehælde wæron.

Swelce eac seo þruh, in þære heo ærest bebyrged wæs, monegum monna, þe heora eagan sargedon & hefigodon, wearð to hælo, þonne heo heora heafod & heora eagan to onheldon & him to gebædon: & sona seo ungescrepnes þæs sares & þære hefignesse from heora eagan gewat.

Ono hwæt heo þa þwogon & baðodon þone lichoman þære halgan fæmnan, & mid neowum hræglum gegyredon & in cirican bæron & in þa stænenan þruh gesetton, þe ðyder gelæded wæs; & þær nu gena oð þisne ondweardan dæg in micelre arwyrðnesse is hæfd.
Wæs þæt eac micel wundor, þæt seo þruh wæs swa gescrepe þære fæmnan lichoman gemeted, swa swa heo synderlice hire gegearwad wære.
Swelce eac seo heafodstow wundorcræftiglice geworht & gescrepelice geheowod æteowde to þam gemete hire heafdes.
Is Elia lond in Eastengla mægðe huhugu syx hund hida in ealondes gelicnesse.
Is eal, swa swa we cwædon, mid fenne & mid wætre ymbsald: ond mid genihtsumnesse ælo, þa ðe in þæm ilcan fennum fongne beoð, hit noman onfeng.
Þær wilnode mynster habban seo gemyndgode Cristes þeowe, forðon heo of þære ylcan mægðe Eastengla lichoman frymþe lædde, swa swa we foresprecende wæron.
Þy nigoðan geare Ecgfriðes rices þæs cyninges wæs geþeoded & ongunnen hefig gewinn & micel gefeoht betweoh hine & æþelred Mercna cyning.
Þa wæs ofslegen in þæm gefeohte be Treontan þære ea ælfwine Ecgfriðes broðor þæs cyninges, geong æðeling eahtatynewintre.
Se wæs swiðe lufiendlic & leof æghwæðerre þeode, forðon þe his sweostor, seo wæs Osþryð haten, hæfde æðelred Mercna cyning him to wife.

Mid þy þa grimran gefeohtes & lengran feondscipes ontimber betweoh þa reðan cyningas & þa folc wæs gesegen up cumende, þa ðeodor Gode se leofa biscop mid godcunde gife & fultume mid his halwendre trymenesse & lare þa ongunnon bernisse swa micelre frecernisse allinga adwæscte, to ðon þæt he gesibbode þa cyningas betweohn & þa folc, þætte næniges monnes feorh to lose wearð, ne mara blodgyte wæs for þæm ofslegenan cyninges breðer; ac he mid fea wið hine geþingade, þæt heora sib wæs.
Ðære sibbe wære micelre tide æfter ðon betweoh þa ilcan cyningas & heora rice awunedon.
In þæm foresprecenan gefeohte, þa ælfwine þæs cyninges broðor ofslegen wæs, wæs sum gemyndelic wise geworden, seo nis to forswigienne, ac heo brycað monigra hælo, gif heo asægd bið.
Wæs þær ofslegen in þæm gefeohte betweoh oðere sum geong cyninges þegn Ecgfriðes, þæs noma wæs Imma.

Mid þy he þa þy dæge ond þære æfterfylgendan nihte betweoh þara oðerra ofslegenra lic geliic deadum læg, ða æt nyhstan onfeng he gaste & wearð geedwerped & up asæt & seolfa his wunde wrað, swa swa he meahte.
Ond æfter þon he hine gereste medmicel fæc, ða ahof hine up & ongan aweggan, gif he hwær ænigne freond metan meahte, þe his gymenne dyde & his wunda læcnian wolde.
Þa he ða þæt dyde, þa wæs he gemeted & genumen from þæm monnum þæs feondlecan weorodes; & þa læddon hine to heora hlaforde, þæt wæs æðelredes gesiið þæs cyninges.

Þa frægn hine se, hwæt he wære, þa ondred he ondettan, þæt he cyninges þegn wære, ac sæde, þæt he folclic mon wære & þearfende & gewiifad hæfde; & þætte he forðon in þa fyrd cwome, þæt he sceolde cyninges þegnum heora ondlifen & mete lædan mid heora heafodgemæccum.
Þa onfeng se gesiið hine & his gyman dyde & his wunde het læcnian.
Þa he ða ongon trumian & haligan, þa bebead he þæt hine mon gebunde, þy læs he on niht onweg fluge & bestæle.
Þa ne meahte hine mon gebindan; forðon sona þæs þe heo onweg eodon, þa ðe hine bundon, þonne toslupon ða bendas & tolesde wæron.
Hæfde he agenne broðor mæssepreost, þæs noma wæs Tuna, se wæs abbud in þæm mynstre & in þære ceastre, seo nu oð þis is nemned from his noman Tunnanceaster.
Mid þy he hine hyrde in þæm gefeohte ofslegenne, þa cwom he & sohte in þæm wæle his lic, hwæðer he hit findan meahte.
Þa funde he oðerne þurh eal þing him þone gelicestan, þa tealde he þæt he hit wære.
Bær hine þa to his mynstre, & arlice bebyrgde: ond fore alysnesse his sawle gelomlice mæssesong dyde.
Þære mærsunge wæs geworden, þæt ic ær cwæð, þæt hine nænig mon meahte gebindan, ac sona instæpe þa bendas toslupon, & he onlysed wæs.
Betweoh þa þing þa eac se gesiþ, se ðe hine hæfde, ongon wundrian & hine frignan, for hwon <hine> mon gebindan ne meahte.
Ond hine ascode hwæðer he ða <alysendlecan> rune cuðe, & þa stafas mid him awritene hæfde, be swylcum men leas spel secgað & spreocað, þæt hine mon forþon gebindan ne meahte.
Þa ondswarede he þæt he noht swylcra cræfta ne cuðe.
Ac ic hæbbe, cwæð he, in minre mægðe minne broðor mæssepreost; ond ic wat, þæt he mec ofslegene talað & for mec gelomlice mæssan deð.
& gif ic nu in oðrum life wære, þonne wære min sawl þær þurh his þingunge from þæm ecum bendum & witum onlysed.

Mid þy he ða hwylce hugu tid mid þone gesiið hæfd wæs, þa ongeton hy, þa hine geornlecor sceawodon, of his ondwlitan & on gebærum & eac swylce on his wordum, þæt he ne wæs of þearfendum folce, swa swa he sægde, ac þæt he wæs æðele strynde.

Þa gecegde se gesið hine deagollice to him; frægn hine þa geornlice, hwonon he wære; ond him wæs gehatende, þæt he him noht laðes ne yfeles gedon wolde, gif he him þæt hluttorlice gecyþan wolde, hwæt he wære.
Þa dyde he swa: ondette him & sægde, þæt he wære cyninges þegn.
Þa ondswarede he him & cwæð: þurh syndrige þine ondsware ic onget & oncneow, þæt þu ne wære swa folclic mon swa ðu sægdest.
Ond ic þe nu secge, þæt þu eart wið mec deaþe scyldig, forþon ealle mine broðor & mine magas in þæm gefeohte wæron ofslegene.
Ond hwæðre ic þec ne wille ofslean, þy læs ic min gehat & mine treowe forleose.
Þa he fullice getrumad wæs, þa bebohte he hine in Lundenne to sumum Frysan.

Þa wolde se hine bindan, ac he ne from him, ne ða he þyder læded wæs, meahte ænige þinga gebunden beon, þeah þe his feond hine onsette oðer benda cyn ond eft oðer: & oftost his bendas toslupon & onlesde wæron from underntide, þonne mon mæssan oftost singeð.
Þa þa ðæt þa geseah se ðe hine gebohte, þæt he mid bendum ne meahte gehearðrod beon, forgef him þa lyfnesse, þæt he moste mid feo hine alysan, gif he meahte.
& he him aðas sealde, þæt he hine eft gesohte oðþe his feoh him onsende.
Þa cwom he to Cent to Hlothere þæm cyninge, se wæs sweostor sunu æðeldryðe þære cwene, bi þære bufan sægd wæs, forðon he geo þære ilcan cwene þegn wæs.
Bæd hine ða, þæt he him þæt weorð his alesnesse gesealde; & he him getiðade, & his hlaforde for hine onsende, swa swa he geheht.
& he þa æfter þissum wæs hweorfende to his eðle; & to his breðer becwom, ond him eal æfter endebyrdnesse sægde, ge hwylce wiðerwordnesse ge eft hwylce frofre in þæm wiðerwordnissum hine becwom.
Ond he gecneow þurh his geseagone, þætte þæm tidum swiðust þa bende onlesde wæron, þæm þe for hine þa symbelnesse mæssena mærsode wæron.
Ge eac feola oðerra gescrepa & gesynta, ða þe him taltriendum gelumpon, þurh þa broðorlican þingunge & þurh lac þære halwendan onsægdnesse he oncneow & ongeat heofon lice him forgifen weosan.

Ond monige men þa ðe þas þing gehyrdon secgan from þæm forsprecenan were, wæron bærnde in geleafan & in arfæstnisse willan to gebiddenne ge ælmessan to sellenne ge Gode asægdnesse to beranne þæs halgan laces, fore generednisse heora freonda þara ðe of weorulde geleordon.
Forþon heo ongeton, þæt seo halwende onsægdnis to ecre alysnesse swiðade & fromade ge lichoman ge sawle.
Ðis spel me sume þara sægdon, þa ðe hit from þæm seolfan were gehyrdon, in þæm hit geworden wæs.
Ond ic hit forþon hluttorlice & untweondlice gelyfde þæm cyriclecan stære to geþeodenne & in to gesettenne.

Wæs ymb syx hund wintra & hundeahtatig from þære Drihtenlecan menniscnesse, þætte seo æfeste Cristes þeowe Hild abbudisse þæs mynstres, þe is cweden Streoneshealh, swa swa we beforan sægdon, æfter monegum heofonlecum dædum, þe heo on eorðan dyde, to onfonne þæs heofonlecan lifes mede ond heo of eorðan alæded leorde þy fifteogeþan dægeKalendarum Decembrium, mid þy heo hæfde syx & <syxti> wintra.
Þæm wintrum todældum efenlice dæle, þreo & þritig þæm ærestum heo æðelice gefylde in weoruldhade drohtiende; ond efnfela þa æfterfylgendan in munclife heo æðelicor Drihtne gehalgode.
Wæs heo eac swylce æðele in woruldgebyrdum, þæt heo wæs þæs cyninges Eadwines neafan dohtor, se wæs Hereric haten.

Mid þy cyninge he to bodunge & to lare þæs eadgan gemynde Paulinus þæs ærestan biscopes Norþanhymbra Cristes geleafan & geryno onfeng, & þone unwemne geheold, oð þæs he geearnode, <þæt> he to his gesihðe becwom.

Þa heo þa Hild woruldhad forlet & Gode anum geteode þeowigan, þa gewat heo in Eastengla mægðe, forþon heo wæs þæs cyninges mæge: willade þonon, gif heo meahte, þæt heo wolde hire eðel forlætan & eal, þæt heo for worulde hæfde, & wolde cuman in Gallia rice & in Caale þæm mynstre in elþeodignesse fore Drihtne lifigean, þæt heo þy eað meahte þæt ece eðel in heofonum geearnigean.
Forþon þe in þæm ilcan mynstre hire sweostor Hereswið, seo wæs Aldwulfes modor Eastengla cyninges, regollicum þeodscipum underþeoded in þa tid baad þone ecan sige.
Þær bysene heo wæs inhyrgende in foresetenesse elþeodgunge, & eal ger in þære foresprecenan mægðe Eastengla hæfd wæs, oð þæt heo eft from Aidane þæm biscope wæs ham gelaðad & gesponen.
Þa onfeng heo anes heowscipes stowe to norðdæle Wiire þære ea, & þær efenlice an ger munuclif dyde mid feawum hire geferum.
Æfter þissum heo wæs geworden abbudisse in þæm mynstre þe is geceged Heoroteae.

Þæt mynster wæs geworden & getimbred noht micle ær from Hegiu þære <æfestan> Cristes þeowe, seo ærest wiifa is sægd in Norðanhymbra mægðe, þæt heo munuchade & haligryfte onfenge þurh halgunge Aidanes þæs biscopes.
Ac heo nales æfter micelre tide, þæs þæ þæt mynster getimbred wæs, gewat to þære ceastre, þe in Englisc is gehaten Kwelcaceaster, & hire wiic asette, þæt heo Gode inlifde.
Þa feng to þæs mynstres gerece Hild seo Cristes þeowe, & heo þæt sona mid regollice life gesette & geendebyrdade, swa swa heo æt gelærdum wæpnedmonnum geleornian meahte.

Forðon Aidan se biscop & monige oðere æfeste weras & gode, þa ðe heo cuðan, for hire snytro & wiisdome & for lufan þæs godcundan þeowdomes heo gelomlice neosodon & sohton; & heo georne lufodon & heo eornlice tydon & lærdon.

Mid þy heo þa feola geara þissum mynstre in regollices lifes lare swiðe geornful fore wæs, ða gelomp, þæt heo onfeng mynster to timbrenne & to endebyrdienne in stowe, seo is geceged Strineshalg; & heo þæt weorc, þe hire þa to geðeoded wæs, unaswundenlice gefylde.
Forþon þa seolfan, þe ær þæt mynster heoldon & rehton, heo mid þeodscipum regollices lifes insette & trymede.
