& heo eac swylce þær soðfæstnesse & arfæstnesse & clænnesse & oðerra gastlicra mægena gehæld ond swiþost sibbe & Godes lufan geornlice lærde, þætte in bisene þære frymþelecan ciricean nænig þær welig wæs ne nænig wædla; ac eallum wæron eal gemæno, & noht agnes ængum gesegen wæs.

Wæs heo swa micelre snytro & wisdomes, þætte nales þæt an þætte þa mættran men ymb heora nydþearfnisse wæron, ac eac swylce cyningas & ealdormen oft from hire geþeaht & wisdom sohton, & hine þær georne gemetton.

Ond heo swa swiðe leornunge godcundra gewreota & soðfæstnisse weorcum hire underþeodde dyde to bigongenne, þætte þær eaðelice monige meahton beon gemette þa <þe> to ciriclicum hade, þæt is to wigbedes þegnunge, geþung ne wæron.
Þæt is to tacne, þæt we gesawon æfter þon fiif biscopas, þa ðe of þam ilcan mynstre cwomon & þær gelærde wæron: & þa wæron ealle micelre leornunge & halignesse weras.
Þa wæron þus hatne & nemde, Bosa, Ætla, Oftfor, Iohannes & Wilfrið.
Bi þæm ærestan we bufan cwædon, þæt he wære in Eoforwiicceastre to biscope gehalgad.
Be þæm æfteran is hrædlice to witanne, þæt he wæs in Dorcetceastre to biscope gehalgod.
Bi þæm neahstan twæm her is æfter to cweðanne, þæt heora se æresta wæs at Heagostealdes ea, ond se æftera wæs in Eoforwiicceastre to biscope gehalgad.

Bi þæm midlestan is nu to secgenne; þa he in æghwæðerum mynstre Hilde þære abbudissan geornlice his leornunge <ætfealh> & gehælde haligra gewreota, þa æt nyhstan wilnade he on his mode þa fulfremedan þing.
Cwom þa to Cent to þære eadgan gemynde Theodore ærcebiscope.
Æfter þon þe he þær sum fæc halgum leornungum gefealh, þa wolde he eac swylce Rome gesecan, þæt in þa tid wæs micles mægenes tald & gelefed.
Þa he þonon eft hwearf, þa gesohte he eft Breotone: ferde þa in Hwicca mægðe.

Þær wæs þa Osric cyning; & he þær Godes word & þæs halgan geleafan bodade & lærde, & somod ætgædre lifes bysene on him seolfum gegearwode eallum þæm þe hine gesegon & gehyrdon: & he micle tide þær wunade.
In þa ilcan tid se biscop þære mægðe, se wæs Bosel haten, wæs mid swa micle untrymnesse his lichoman hefigad, þæt he þa biscopþegnunge þurh hine þegnian ne meahte.

Forðon þa ealra heora dome se foresprecena wer for hine in biscophade wæs gecoren; ond þa þurh æðelredes hæse Mercna cyninges þær eadgan gemynde Wilferð biscop hine to biscope gehalgode, se in þa tid þone biscophad þegnade Midelengla.
Forþon se ærcebiscop Theodor wæs þa forðfered, & nænig oðer biscop þa gena for hine gehalgad wæs.

In þære ilcan mægðe hwene ær, þæt is ær þæm foresprecenan Godes men Bosle, wæs of þære ilcan abbudissan mynstre sum from wer & wel gelæred & scearpre gleawnesse, <se> wæs to biscope gecoren, þæs noma wæs Tatfrið.
Ac ær þon þe he gehadad beon meahte, þæt he wæs mid hrædlice deaðe forgripen.
Ono seo foresprecene Cristes þeowe Hild abbudisse ealle, þa þe hy cuþon, fore arfæstnisse tacne & Godes gife gewunedan heo modor cegean & nemnan.

& nales þæt an þæt heo in hire mynstre þæm ondweardum lifes bysen gestode, ac eac swylce monegum feor wuniendum, to þæm þe se gesælga hlisa hire geornfulnesse & hire mægenes becwom, þæt him se godre ræce & hælo intingan ðegnade.
Wæs þæt eac gedefen, þætte þæt swefn gefylled wære, þætte Breogoswið hire modor geseah on hire cildhade.
Þa Hereric hire wer wracade under Cerdice Bretta cyninge, & þær wæs mid attre acweald, þa geseah heo þurh swefn, swa swa he semninga from hire ahefen & alæded wære.
Þa sohte heo hine mid ealre geornfulnesse & nænige swaðe his owern æteowdon.
Þa heo hine ða bihygdelice & geornlice sohte, þa gemette heo semninga under hire hrægle gyldne sigele swiðe deorwyrðe.
Þa heo þa geornlice heo sceawode & beheold, þa wæs heo gesegen mid swiðe micelre beorhtnesse leohtes scinan, þæt heo eal Breotene gemæro mid hire leohtes sciman gefylde.
Þæt swefn wæs soðlice gefylled in hire deahter, bi þære we nu sprecað.
Forþon hire lif nales hire anre & hire underðeoddum wæs leohtes bisen, ac swiðe monegum wide þæm þe woldon Gode wel lifigean.

Ono mid þy heo þa monig ger þyssum mynstre, þæt is æt Streonesheale, in abbudissan þegnunge fore wæs, þa licede þæm arfæstan foreseonde usse hæle hire þa halgan sawle eac <swylce> mid longre untrymnesse lichoman ademde & asodene beon, þæt æfter þæs apostoles bisene hire mægen in untrumnesse lichoman gefremed & getrymed wære.
Þa wæs heo gestonden mid hefigre untrymnesse lichoman, & þurh syx singal ger þære ilcan hefignesse þære adle <unblinnendlice> won.

Ond in ealre þære tide heo næfre blon hire sceppende ælmehtegum Gode þoncunge don, ge eac þa bebodenan heorde hire monian & læran, þæt heo ealle gemyndige wæron hire bisene, þæt hy in þæm gesyndelecum þingum & in þære onfangnon hælo lichoman geornlice Drihtne þeowde & hyrde, & on þam wiðerweardum þingum oððe on lichoman untrymnessum þæt heo symle getreowlice Drihtne þoncunge dyde.
Þa wæs þy seofoðan geare hire untrymnesse, þætte seo adl & þæt sar hwyrfde in hyre innoðas.
& heo becwom to þæm ytemæstan dæge: & ymb honcred utan heo onfeng wegneste þære swiðe halgan gemænsumnesse Cristes lichoman & his blode.
Þa geheht heo þa Godes þeowas to hire, þa ðe in þæm ilcan mynstre wæron; & heo þa gyt hy monade & lærde, þæt hy betweoh hym heoldon & eallum Godes monnum sibbe & lufan.
Ond betweohn þa word hyre trymenesse & laare heo bliðe deað geseah; & gean soðre þæt ic Drihtnes wordum spreco, þæt heo of deaðe leorde to life.

Þa wæs in þære seolfan nihte, þætte se ælmihtega Drihten hire forðfore in oðrum mynstre fyrr gesettum, þæt heo þy ylcan geare ær getimbrede & is nemned Heacanos, mid sweotolre gesyhðe wæs geeaðmeded to onwreonne.
Wæs in þæm seolfan mynstre sumu haligu nunne, þære noma wæs Begu, seo wæs Drihtne gehalgad in clænum mægðhade ma þonne þritig wintra; & heo þær in munuchade Drihtne þeowade.

Þa wæs heo restende in sweostra slæperne, ða gehyrde heo semninga in þære lyfte uppe cuðne sweg & hleoðor heora clucgan, þær heo wunedon to gebedum gecegde & awehte beon, þon heora hwylc of worulde geleored wæs.
Þa geseah heo openum eagum, þæs þe hire þuhte, of þæs huses hrofe ufan micel leoht cuman; & eal þæt hus gefylde.

Þa heo þa in þæt leoht bihygdelice locade & hit georne beheold, þa geseah heo þære foresprecenan Godes þeowe sawle Hilde þære abbudissan in þæm seolfan leohte, engla weorodum gelædendum, to heofonum up borenne beon.
Mid þy heo þa þy slæpe tobrægd, þa geseah heo oðere sweostor ymb heo restende.
Ða onget heo ge in þæm swefne ge on hire modes gesyhðe hire æteawed weosan, þætte heo geseah.
& heo sona aras mid micle ege afyrhted & orn to þære fæmnan, þe ða wæs mynstres abbudisse wæs Hilde gingre þære noma wæs Freogið.

& mid wope & mid tearum wæs swiðe geondgoten, ond longe sworettunge wæs teonde; & hire sægde ealra heora modur Hilde abbudissan þa of worulde geleoran, & hyre geseondre mid micle leohte & mid engla þreatum to þæm ecean leohte heofona rices wuldres & to gemanan þara uplicra ceastorwarena astigan.
Ða heo þa þæt <gehyrde>, þa weahte heo ealle þa sweostor, & heht to cirican gangan; & in gebedum & on sealmsonge for heora modor sawle georne þingodon.
Þa heo þæt þa geornlice dydon þa lafe þære neahte tide, þa cwomon swiðe ær in dagunge sume broðor, þa ðe hyre forðfore sægdon, from þære stowe þe heo forðfered wæs.
Þa ondswaredon heo & cwædon, þæt heo þæt ilce ær wisten & ongeaton.

& mid þy heo þa þurh endebyrdnesse þæm broðrum arehton, hu heo þas þing & hwonne heo geleornodon, ond heo him sægdon, in hwylce tiid heo of middangearde leorde, þa wæs gemeted, þæt hyre geleornes wæs in þa ilcan tid, þe hire þurh þa gesyhð æteawed wæs.
& mid fægre geþwærnisse þara wisena wæs godcundlice foresegen, þæt mid þy heo hyre uutgong gesegon of þeossum life, þa ða uppe ongeton hire ingong in þæt ece liif haligra sawla.
Þær seondon betweoh þæm mynstrum twæm þreottyne mila ametene.
In ðeosse abbudissan mynstre wæs sum broðor syndriglice mid godcundre gife gemæred & geweorðad.

Forþon he gewunade gerisenlice leoð wyrcan, þa ðe to æfestnisse & to arfæstnisse belumpen, swa ðætte, swa hwæt swa he of godcundum stafum þurh boceras geleornode, þæt he æfter medmiclum fæce in scopgereorde mid þa mæstan swetnisse & inbryrdnisse geglængde & in Engliscgereorde wel geworht forþbrohte.
Ond for his leoþsongum monigra monna mod oft to worulde forhogdnisse & to geþeodnisse þæs heofonlican lifes onbærnde wæron.
Ond eac swelce monige oðre æfter him in Ongelþeode ongunnon æfeste leoð wyrcan: ac nænig hwæðre him þæt gelice don meahte.
Forþon he nales from monnum ne þurh mon gelæred wæs, þæt he þone leoðcræft leornade, ac he wæs godcundlice gefultumed & þurh Godes gife þone songcræft onfeng.
Ond he forðon næfre noht leasunge, ne idles leoþes wyrcan meahte, ac efne þa an þa ðe to æfestnesse belumpon, & his þa æf<../images/etail.gif>stan tungan gedeofanade singan.
Wæs he se mon in weoruldhade geseted oð þa tide þe he wæs gelyfdre ylde, & næfre nænig leoð geleornade.

Ond he forþon oft in gebeorscipe, þonne þær wæs blisse intinga gedemed, þæt heo ealle scalde þurh endebyrdnesse be hearpan singan, þonne he geseah þa hearpan him nealecan, þonne aras he for forscome from þæm symble & ham eode to his huse.
Þa he þæt þa sumre tide dyde, þæt he forlet þæt hus þæs gebeorscipes, & ut wæs gongende to neata scipene, þara heord him wæs þære neahte beboden.
Þa he ða þær in gelimplice tide his leomu on reste gesette & onslepte, þa stod him sum mon æt þurh swefn & hine halette & grette & hine be his noman nemnde: Cedmon, sing me hwæthwugu.
Þa ondswarede he & cwæð: Ne con ic noht singan; & ic forþon of þeossum gebeorscipe uteode, & hider gewat, forþon ic naht singan ne cuðe.
Eft he cwæð se ðe wið hine sprecende wæs: Hwæðre þu meaht singan.
Þa cwæð he: Hwæt sceal ic singan?
Cwæð he: Sing me frumsceaft.

Þa he ða þas andsware onfeng, þa ongon he sona singan in herenesse Godes Scyppendes þa fers & þa word þe he næfre gehyrde, þære endebyrdnesse þis is: Nu sculon herigean heofonrices weard, meotodes meahte & his modgeþanc, weorc wuldorfæder, swa he wundra gehwæs, ece Drihten, or onstealde.
He ærest sceop eorðan bearnum heofon to hrofe halig scyppend; þa middangeard monncynnes weard, ece Drihten, æfter teode firum foldan, frea ælmihtig.
Þa aras he from þæm slæpe, & eal, þa þe he slæpende song, fæste in gemynde hæfde.
& þæm wordum sona monig word in þæt ilce gemet Gode wyrðes songes togeþeodde.
Þa com he on morgenne to þæm tungerefan, þe his ealdormon wæs: sægde him hwylce gife he onfeng; & he hine sona to þære abbudissan gelædde & hire þa cyðde & sægde.
Þa heht heo gesomnian ealle þa gelæredestan men & þa leorneras: & him ondweardum het secgan þæt swefn, & þæt leoð singan, þæt ealra heora dome gecoren wære, hwæt oððe hwonon þæt cumen wære.
Þa wæs him eallum gesegen, swa swa hit wæs, þæt him wære from Drihtne sylfum heofonlic gifu forgifen.
Þa rehton heo him & sægdon sum halig spell & godcundre lare word: bebudon him þa, gif he meahte, þæt he in swinsunge leoþsonges þæt gehwyrfde.
Þa he ða hæfde þa wisan onfongne, þa eode he ham to his huse; & cwom eft on morgenne, & þy betstan leoðe geglenged him asong & ageaf, þæt him beboden wæs.
Ða ongan seo abbudisse clyppan & lufigean þa Godes gife in þæm men; & heo hine þa monade & lærde þæt he woruldhad anforlete & munuchad onfenge: & he þæt wel þafode.
Ond heo hine in þæt mynster onfeng mid his godum, & hine geþeodde to gesomnunge þara Godes þeowa; & heht hine læran þæt getæl þæs halgan stæres & spelles.
Ond he eal, þa he in gehyrnesse geleornian meahte, mid hine gemyndgade; & swa swa clæne neten eodorcende in þæt sweteste leoð gehwerfde.
& his song & his leoð wæron swa wynsumu to gehyranne, þætte seolfan þa his lareowas æt his muðe wreoton & leornodon.

Song he ærest be middangeardes gesceape & bi fruman moncynnes & eal þæt stær Genesis, þæt is seo æreste Moyses booc; & eft bi utgonge Israhela folces of ægypta londe & bi ingonge þæs gehatlandes; & bi oðrum monegum spellum þæs halgan gewrites canones boca; ond bi Cristes menniscnesse; & bi his þrowunge; & bi his upastignesse in heofonas; & bi þæs Halgan Gastes cyme, & þara apostola lare: & eft bi þæm dæge þæs toweardan domes, & bi fyrhtu þæs tintreglican wiites, & bi swetnesse þæs heofonlecan rices, he monig leoð geworhte.
Ond swelce eac oðer monig be þæm godcundan fremsumnessum & domum he geworhte.
In eallum þæm he geornlice gemde, þæt he men atuge from synna lufan & mandæda, & to lufan & to geornfulnesse awehte godra dæda.
Forþon he wæs se mon swiþe æfest & regollecum þeodscipum eaðmodlice underþeoded.
Ond wið þæm þa ðe in oðre wisan don woldon, he wæs mid welme micelre ellenwodnisse onbærned.
Ond he forðon fægre ænde his lif betynde & geendade.

Forþon þa ðære tide nealæcte his gewitenesse & forðfore, þa wæs he feowertynum dagum ær, þæt he wæs lichomlicre untrymnesse þrycced & hefgad, hwæðre to þon gemetlice, þæt he ealle þa tid meahte ge sprecan ge gongan.
Wæs þær in neaweste untrumra monna hus, in þæm heora þeaw wæs, þæt heo þa untrumran, & þa ðe æt forðfore wæron, inlædon sceoldon & him þær ætsomne þegnian.
Þa bæd he his þegn on æfenne þære neahte, þe he of worulde gongende wæs, þæt he in þæm huse him stowe gegearwode, þæt he gerestan meahte.
Þa wundrode se þegn, for hwon he ðæs bæde, forþon him þuhte þæt his forðfor swa neah ne wære: dyde hwæðre swa swa he cwæð & bibead.

Ond mid þy he ða þær on reste eode, & he gefeonde mode sumu þing mid him sprecende ætgædere & gleowiende wæs, þe þær ær inne wæron, þa wæs ofer midde neaht þæt he frægn, hwæðer heo ænig husl inne hæfdon.
Þa ondswarodon heo & cwædon: Hwylc þearf is ðe husles?
Ne þinre forþfore swa neah is, nu þu þus rotlice & þus glædlice to us sprecende eart.
Cwæð he eft: Berað me husl to.
Þa he hit þa on honda hæfde, þa frægn he hwæþer heo ealle smolt mod & buton eallum incan bliðe to him hæfdon.
Þa ondswaredon hy ealle & cwædon, þæt heo nænigne incan to him wiston, ac heo ealle him swiðe bliðemode wæron: & heo wrixendlice hine bædon, þæt he him eallum bliðe wære.
Þa ondswarade he & cwæð: Mine broðor mine þa leofan, ic eom swiðe bliðemod to eow & to eallum Godes monnum.
Ond swa wæs hine getrymmende mid þy heofonlecan wegneste, & him oðres lifes ingong gegearwode.
Þa gyt he frægn, hu neah þære tide wære, þætte þa broðor arisan scolden & Godes lof ræran & heora uhtsong singan.
Þa ondswaredon heo: Nis hit feor to þon.
Cwæð he: Teala: wuton we wel þære tide bidan.
& þa him gebæd & hine gesegnode mid Cristes rode tacne, ond his heafod <onhylde> to þam bolstre, & medmicel fæc onslepte; & swa mid stilnesse his lif geendade.
Ond swa wæs geworden, þætte swa swa hluttre mode & bilwitre & smyltre wilsumnesse Drihtne þeode, þæt he eac swylce swa smylte deaðe middangeard wæs forlætende, & to his gesihðe becwom.
Ond seo tunge, þe swa monig halwende word in þæs scyppendes lof gesette, he ða swelce eac þa ytmæstan word in his herenisse, hine seolfne segniende & his gast in his honda bebeodende, betynde.
Eac swelce þæt is gesegen, þæt he wære gewis his seolfes forðfore, of þæm we nu secgan hyrdon.
Þyssum tidum ðæt mynster, þæt mon nemneð æt Coludes burg, þæs we beforan gemyndgodon, þurh ungemænne synne fyre & lege wæs fornumen.
Ðæt hwæðre æðelice ongetan meahton ealle þa þæt cuðon, þætte þæt gelomp for wean & for yfelnesse þara eardiendra þær in þære byrig, ond þara swiþust þe ðær aldormen wæran.

Ac him hwæðre won ne wæs seo monung þær godcundan ærfæstnesse, þæt heo heora synne witnade & bette þurh fæsten, þurh wopas, þurh gebedo, & eorre from him acyrde þæs soðfæstan deman, in þa onlicnesse Niniuitwearena.
Wæs in þæm ylcan mynstre sum wer of Scotta þeode, se wæs Adamnanus haten.

Lifde se mon his liif in micelre forhæfdnisse & in halgum gebedum Gode swiðe wilsumlice, swa ðæt he næfre mete onfeng ne swæsendo þeah, <buton> þy Drihtenlecan dæge & þy fiftan wiicdæge, ond oft onwalge neahte þurh wæccan in halgum gebedum astod & awunade.
Seo þearlwisnis þæs heardan lifes him ærest of nede becwom for bote his synna; ac forðgongendre tide þæt he þæt ned in wunan gecyrde.
Gelomp him in geoguðhade his, þæt he sume maandæde gefremede.
Ða seo scyld þa to his heortan hwearf, þa onscunede he heo hefiglice & him ondred, þæt he for þære stronglice witnad beon sceolde from þæm þearlwisan deman.

Eode þa to sumum mæssepreoste, from þæm he gew<../images/etail.gif>nde, þæt him hælu weg æteawed beon meahte: ondette him þa his scylde, & bæd þæt he him geþeaht sealde, hu he meahte befleon from þæm toweardan eorre.

Þa he ða his scylde gehyrde, þa cwæð he: Micel wund behofað micles læcedomes: & forþon, swa swiþe swa ðu mægge, ætfealh þu þinum fæstenum & sealmsongum & gebeodum, þætte þu seo forecumende Drihtnes onsyne in ondetnisse, & þu geearnie hine þe mildne gemetan.

Ond he þa, þæne þe þæt unmæte sar nom & hefigode his scylde gewitnes, & he wilnode, þæt he hraðe alysed wære from þam inlicum bendum þara synna, þe he hefigod wæs cwæð he to þam mæssepreoste: Ic eom geongre yldo & hal in minum lichoman.

Swa hwæt swa ðu me onsettest & bebeodest to donne, þæt ic halsige in þæm Drihtnes dæge, al ic þæt eaþelice abere, þeah þe þu mec hate ealle niht wæccende in gebedum stondan, & þeah þe ic sceole ealle wican fæstan, ic þæt leoflice do.
Cwæð he: Micel þæt is, þæt þu ealle wican buton ondleofone lichoman awunige: ac twydæglic fæsten oðþe þreodæglic fæsten is genoh to healdenne.
Do þis, cwæð he, oðþæt ic eft æfter tide to ðe cyme & þe þonne fullicor æteawe, hwæt þu don scyle, & hu lange þu on hreowe awunian scyle.
Þa ferde se mæssepreost from him.
Þa gelomp for sumum intingan, þæt he semninga gewat in Hibernia Scotta ealond, þonon he ær cwom: ne he eft ma to him hwearf æfter heora gecwide.

Wæs he hwæðre gemyndi his bebodes ond eac his gehates; ond he in hreowe tearum & in halgum wæccenum & in micelre forhæfdnesse Drihtne þeowade, swa ðæt he næfre oftor gereorde ne swæsendo þah, þonne þy Drihtenlecan dæge & þy fiftan wicdæge, swa swa ic fore cwæð; oðrum dagum he swa fæstende awunade.
Mid þy he ða gehyrde þone mæssepreost gewitan in Hiibernia & þær forðferende beon, he symle of þære tide þæt gemyndgade gemet þære forhæfdnesse heold & læste.
& þætte for intingan þæs godcundan eges æne siðe for his scylde onbryrded ongan, swa he eft for intingan þære godcundan lufan lustfulliende þam ecum medum fæstlice forð læste.
Mid þy he þæt þa longre tide forð heold & dyde, þa gelomp sume dæge, þæt he wæs from þæm mynstre for sumum þinge fyr gongende; & wæs an þara broðra his gefera & him mid eode.
Þa heo þa hæfdon heora siðfæt geferedne, þa hwurfon heo eft to ham.

& mid þy heo þa þæm mynstre nealecton, & heo gesegon þa getimbru healice areht & ahæfen, þa geswearc se Godes mon semninga & ongan hatlice & biterlice wepan, & þa unrotnesse his heortan mid his andwlitan tacnunge ypte & cyðde.
Þa þæt þa se his gefera geseah & ongeat, þa frægn he hine & ascode, hwæt him wære & forhwon he swa gebærde.
Þa cwæð he: Eal þas getimbru, þe ðu her gesyhst & sceawast, ge þa maran ge ða mætran, neah is þæt hy eal fyr nimeð & in ascan gehwyrfað.
Þa se broðor þæt þa gehyrde, sona þæs þe heo in þæt mynster eodon, þa cyðde he hit & sægde þære meder þære gesomnunga þære abbudissan, seo wæs æbbe haten.
Þa wæs heo be gewyrhte swiðe gedrefed bi swelcum witedome & forht geworden, geheht þa to hire ðone Godes monn & geornlice hine frægn & ascade hwonan he ða wisan cuðe & ongete.
Cwæð he: Ic wæs ungeara on neaht abisgad on weacenum & on sealmsonge & on gebedum; þa geseah ic somninga me ætstondan sumne monnan uncuþes ondwleotan.
Ða wæs ic for his ondweardnisse swiðe afyrhted, þa frefrede he mec & cwæð, þæt ic me ne ondrede.
Ond swa swa <he> cuþre stefne wæs to me sprecende: Wel ðu dest, cwæð he, þæt ðu in ðisse tide neahtlicre stilnisse nalæs ðec slæpe forgeofan, ah ma woldes weacenum & gebedum ætfeolan.
Cwæð ic: ic wat þæt me ðæs is micel ðearf þæt ic halwendum weacenum ætfeole, & for minum gedwolum & synnum geornlice Dryhten bensie.

Cwæð he se ðe mid mec spræc: Soð ðu sagast, cwæð he, æghwæðer ge þe ðæs is þearf ge mongum, þæt hio hiora synna mid godum weorcum alese, & þonne hio blinne from gewinne hwilwendlicra þinga, ðæt hio ðonne fore willunga ðeara ecra goda þy freolslicor winne.
Ah ðis hwæðre fea ane doð.

Soð ic secge, þæt ic nu eal þis mynster ðurh endebyrdnisse geondferde & syndrigra hus & bedd geseah: & nænigne of eallum butan þe ic gemette ymb his saule hælo abisgodne beon; ah alle ge wæpnedmenn ge wifmenn oððo hefige slæpe syndon, oððe to synnum wacedon.
Ond ða hus ða ðe in to gebiddenne & to leornienne geworhte wæron, ða syndon nu in hus gehwerfed <oferæta> & druncennesse & leasspellunge & oðerra unalefedlecra scylda.

& eac swelce ða fæmnan, ða ðe Gode gehalgode wæron, forhogdre are heara ondetnisse, ond swa oft swa hio æmtan habbað, þæt hio smaelo hrægel weofað & wyrcað, mid ðæm hio oððo hio siolfe frætwað in bryda onlicnesse, in frecenesse hiora stalles oððo <utwæpnedmonna> friondscipes him ceapiað.
Forðon bi gewyrhte þysse stowe & hire eardiendum hefig wræc of hiofenum grimsiendum legum is gegearwad.
Cwæð hio sio abbudisse to him: Forhwon ne woldes ðu sona hraðe ða deagolnisse me cyðan & secgan.
Ða ondswarode he & cwæð: Ic ondred for þinre arwyrðnisse ðæt þu sceolde to swiðe gedrefed & afyrhted beon; & hwæðre ðas frofre ðu hafast, þæt hit on ðinum dagum ðis wite ofer ðas burg ne cymeð.
Ða ðios gesiehð ða wæs gemæred, ða wæs hwelchugu fæc ðæt þa bigengan þære stowe, ðæt is feaum dagum, ongunnon him ondrædan & hio seolfe clænsian, & mandæde forleton.
Ond eftsona æfter ðære abbudissan forðfore hio hwurfon to þam ærran unsefernessum, & ec micle manfulran fremedon.
& mid ðy cwædon: Nu is sib & orsorhnes: hi ða instepe, ða hie laesest wendon, mid þy wiite ðæs foresprecenan wræces slægene wæron.

All þas ðing me ðus gewurden se arwyrða min efenmæssepreost Eedgyls sægde, se ða in ðam mynstre eardade & drohtode, & eft in ussum mynstre longe tide lifde & þær forðferde, æfter ðon monge ðara bigengena ðonon gewitan for þære burge tolesnesse.

Ðis spel we forðon setton in ure bec, þæt we men monede, ðæt hio gesege Dryhtnes weorc, hu egesfullic he is on geðeahtingum ofer monna bearn, ðy læs we ænige tide ussum licumlicum unalefednessum sion þeowiende, & læs Godes dom forhtige & we us ondræde, ðonne we scylen, & his yrre semninga us eac ðreage & usic <oððe> hwilwendlicum yrmðum rihtlice swence & wecce, oððe to ecre forwyrde heardwendlice gedeme.
Þa wæs ymb syx hund wintra & feower & hundeahtatig æfter þære Drihtenlecan menniscnesse, þy geare, þætte Ecgfrið Norðanhymbra cyning sende weorod & fyrd in Hiibernia Scotta ealond.
Þær wæs Beorht latteow & heretoga, & heo þa unsceððendan þeode & symle Ongolcynne þa holdoston earmlice forhergodon, swa ðæt cyricum ne mynstrum seo herehand sparode nene arode.

Ond þa seolfe landleodan, swa swiðe swa hi meahton, heo hy weredon & him wiðcompodon, & him on fultum cegdon þa godcundan aarfæstnesse, ond singalum onbenum longe bædon, þæt heo heofonlice gewrecene wæron.
Ond þeah þe wærgcweodole Godes rice gesittan ne mægen, hwæðre is gelyfed, þætte þa be gewyrhte wyrgde wæron for heora arleasnesse, þæt heo hræðe þurh Drihtnes wrace heora scylda wite þrowedon.

Forþon þe soðlice þy nyhstan geare æfter ðeossum, mid þy se ylca cyning gedyrstiglice here lædde to forhergianne Peohta mægðe & him swiðe þæt his freond beweredon & ealra swiðust þære eadigan gemynde <Cuðberht>, se þa neowan to biscope gehalgad wæs, þa gelædde he hwæðre here in Peohtas þa licetton heo fleam, & hine betyldon in neara fæsten micel ungeferedra mora.
Ond he mid þy mæstan dæle his weorodes ofslegen wæs þy feowertegðan geare his yldo, þy fiftegðan geare his rices, þy þreotteoþan dægeKalendarum Iuniarum.
& swa swa ic ær cwæð, beweredon his freond him, þæt he þæt gefeoht ne ongunne.

Ac forþon þe he ne wolde þy ærran geare gehyran þone arwyrðan fæder Ecgberht, þæt he Sceottas hine noht sceðþende ne afuhte, þa wæs him seald þurh wite þære synne, þæt he eft þa ne gehyrde, þa ðe hine wilnadon from his forwyrde gecegean.
Of þære tide ongan se hyht & mægen Ongolcynnes rices toflowan & gewanad beon.
Forðon þe Peohtas heora æhte lond eft onfengon, þæt Engle ær hæfdon ond Sceottas, þa ðe in Breotone wæron, swa; ond Bretta eac swelce micel dæl freodom onfengon.

Þær betweoh monige Ongelþeode, þa ðe oðþe mid sweorde ofslægene wæron oððe þeodome betæhte, oðþe of Peohta londe onweg flugon, ond eac swylce se arwyrða Godes mon Trumwine, se ðe heora biscop wæs, gewat mid his geferum, þa ðe wæron in þæm mynstre æbbercurni, þæt is geseted in Engla londe ac hwæðre neah þæm sæ, þe Engla lond & Peohta tosceadaþ.
& he þa se biscop his geferan, swa hwær swa he meahte, þurh mynster his freondum wæs befæstende; ond he him seolfum wunenesse & wic geceas in þæm oft cwedenan mynstre, þæt is geceged Streoneshealh.
Ond he þær mid feawa his geferena in heardnesse munuclifes nales him seolfum anum ac swiðe monegum bryce monegra geara tide lifde.
& he þær eac swelce forðferde, & in cirican Sancte Petres þæs apostoles æfter gerisenre are his lifes & his hada bebyrged wæs.
Wæs þæs ilcan mynstres abbodesse in ða tid seo cynelice fæmne ælflæd ætgædere mid Eanflæde hire meder, þære we beforan gemyngodan.
Ah ða se biscop þider com, mycelne fultum gereces & somed hire lifes frofre Gode seo wilsume fæmne in him gemette.
Ða feng Ealdfrið æfter Ecgfriðe to rice.
Se man wæs se gelærdesta in gewreotum; se wæs sægd, þæt he his broðor wære Osweos sunu þæs cyninges.
& he ðone toworpnan steal þæs rices, þeah ðe hit wære binnan nearwum gemærum, eaðelice geedneowade.

Þy geare þaa, þæt is ymb syx hund wintra & fif & hundehtatig from ðære Dryhtenlican menniscnesse, þæt Hloþhere Cantwara cyning ðis deadlice lif geendode & forðferde, se æftera Ecbyrhte his breðer, se ehta winter ricsade; þa feng he to rice & þæt hæfde XII winter.
Wæs he gewundad in Suþseaxna gefeohte, þa wið hine Eadric Ecgbyrhtes sunu gesomnade; ond þa betweoh ðon þe hine man lacnade, he forðferde.
& þa æfter him se ilca Eadric oðer healf gear þæt rice hæfde.
Þa he ða forðferde, þa ðæt rice þa sum fæc tide tweonde cyningas & fremde forluron & <towurpun>, oþðæt heora riht cyning Wihtred, þæt wæs Ecgbyrhtes sunu, wæs in rice gestrongad.
Ond he þa somod ætgædre mid <æfestnesse> ge mid geornfulnesse his ðeode fram utlicre hergunge generede & alysde.
Ono ðy sylfan geare ðe Ecgferð cyning lifes ende onfeng, gedyde he þæt man ðone halgan wer & ðone arwyrðan Cuþbryht to biscope gehalgode ðære cirican æt Lindesfarona æ.
Se ær in medmyclum ealonde, þæt is Farne nemned, ancorlif lædde þurh monig gear in mycelre forhæfdnesse lichaman ond modes.
Is ðæt ealond from ðære ilcan cyrican feor ut on garsecgge geseted, huhugu on nigen milum.
& he se halga Godes mon from þære ærestan yldo cnihthades simle beorn in gelise & in geornfulnesse æwfæstes lifes: ac þa he gewexen wæs, ða wilnode he & onfeng munuchade.
& ærest eode in Mailros ðæt mynster, þæt is geseted on ofre Tuidon streames.
Ðæt mynster þa heold & rihte Eata biscop, se wæs milde wer & monðwære, & se æfter wæs gewarden biscop in Hægstealdes æ & in Lindesfarona æ, swa swa we beforan gemyngodon.
Þæs mynstres profost & regolweard wæs in ða tid Boisel, se wæs mycelra mægena mæssepreost & witedomes gastes.
Ðisses discipulhada Cuðbyrht wæs eadmodlice underþeoded; & wisdom haligra gewrita & godra weorca bysene fram him nam.

Æfter þon ðe he ða to Dryhtne geleorde, þa wæs Cuðbyrht ðæs ilcan mynstres regolweard geworden; & he monige æghweðer ge mid aldorlicnesse his <lareowdomes> ge mid bisene his gesawenlicra dæda to regollicum life gesette ond intimbrede.

& nalas ðæt he ðæm mynstre anum regollices lifes manunge & samod his bysene gearwode, ac swelce eac ðæt ymbsette folc feor & wide from ðæm life ðæs dyslecan gewunan to lufan þara heofenlicra <gifeana> georne gemde to gehwyrfenne.

Forðon ðe monige ðone geleafan, þe hie hæfdon, mid unrihtum weorcum idledon, ond swylce eac manige in ða tid þæs myclan woles & moncwildes gymeleasedan ðæm gerynum þæs halgan geleafan, mid þæm hie gelærede wæron, & to ðæm dwoligendum læcedomum deofulgylda ofestton & scyndon; swa swa hie þæt sende wite from Gode Sceppende þurh heora galdor oþþe <lyfesne> oððe þurh hwylce hwugu deogolnesse deofolcræftes bewerian mehton.

Ono æghweðerne gedwolan to gereccenne se Godes man wæs ut gongende of ðæm mynstre gelomlice: hwilum wæs on horse sittende, ac oftor on his fotum gangende; for to þæm ymbsettum tunum & ðæm dwoligendum soðfæstnesse weg <bodode> & lærde.
Ðæt sylfe eac swylce Boisel his magister on his tide gewunelice dyde.

Wæs in ða tid ðeaw Ongolcynnes folcum þæt, þonne mæssepreost oðþe oðer in tun com, ðæt hie ealle to his bebode gesomnedon Godes word to gehyrenne; & fuslice gehyrdon, ða ðe him gelærde wæron, ond eac swylce neodlice mid dædum læstton, ða ðe hie ongeotan mehton.

Ðonne wæs ðam Godes menn Cuðbyrhte swa mycel getydnes & gelærednes to sprecenne & swa mycel lufu godcundre lare, ðe he læran ongon, ond swylc leoht engelices ondwlitan him ofscan, ðætte nænig ðara onweardra his heortan degolnessa him helan dorste, ac ealle openlice heora dæda þurh ondettnesse forðbæron.
Forðon þe hi tealdon & him ðuhte, ðæt hine ða ane miþe, þe he ðaa ne heora degolnesse witan ne gymde; ond hi ða geondettan synne mid medemum wæstmum soðre hreowe gebetton, swa he bebead.

& gewunode he swiðost ða stowe geondferan & in ðæm tunum godcunde lare bodian, þa ðe in heaum morum & in reðum feorr gesette wæron & oðrum on gryre wæron to neosienne, & æghweðer ge mid þearfendnesse ge mid heora ungelærednesse ðara lareowa <fore> hiaðoradon: ða he hweðere mid arfæste gewinne mid mycelre geornfulnesse heofenlicre lare lustfullice beeode.

Ond of ðæm mynstre uteode oft onwalge wucan, hwilum twa oððe ðreo; swylce eac oft ealle monðe þæt he ham ne hwearf, ac wunode in ðæm morlandum & ðæt ungelærede folc somod ge mid worde his lara ge mid weorce his mægena to þæm heofenlican cleopode & laðode.

Ono mid þy he ða se arwyrða Godes ðeow monig gear in Mægilros ðæm mynstre drohtiende wæs, & þær mid miclum tacnum gastlicra mægena scan & byryhte, ða genam hine æt nehstan his se arwyrða abbod Eata to Lindesfarena ea, ðæt he ðær eac swilce ðæm broðrum sealde regollices ðeodscipes gehæled, ge mid ealdorlicnesse his lare ge mid his sylfes dæde, ypte & cyðde.
Forðon ða sylfan stowe þe se ilca arwyrða fæder Eata mid abbudes anwalde heold & rehte wæs ðær io on ealdum tidum ge biscop mid his geferum, ge eac abbod wunode mid munecum.
Hweðere hie to þæs biscopes scire heowesclice belumpon.
Forðon se halga Godes man Iodon, se ðe ærest ðære stowe biscop wæs, big munuchade, he ðider com mid munecum & munuclifes drohtunge he in ðæm mynstre gesette.
Ðonon ða se halga Godes man Cuðbryht, wexendum geearningum æfestre ingehygde, ond eac swylce to degolnesse & to stillnesse becom ðære godcundan sceawunge ancerlifes, swa we ær beforan sægdon.

Ac forðon þe ær monegum gearum be his life & mægenum we genyhtsumlice awriton, ge meterfersum ge geradre spræce, ðis an nu in ondweardnesse is genog to gemyngienne, þæt ða he ðæt ealond secan wolde, ðæt he wæs ðæm broðrum cidende & ðus cwæð: Gif me seo godcunde geofu in ðære stowe forgifen beon wile, þæt ic lifgan mote be minum hondgewinne, ic ðær lustlice wunige.
Gif hit hwæt elles bið, ic hrædlice mid Godes willan eft to eow hweorfe.
Wæs seo stow ge wæteres wædla ge eorðwæstma ge treowa; ah þær wæs werigra gasta weorod & eardungstow & æghwylcere menniscre eardunge ungescræpe.
Ac þa to willan ðæs Godes weres heo eardiendlic wæs geworden; ond sona for his cyme ða wergan gastas ðonon onweg gewiton.

& þa mid þy ðe ða feond onweg gewitone wæron, þa gesohte he him nearo wic & wununesse, ond þa mid dice & mid eorðwealle utan ymbsealde & gefæstnode; & in ðæm ða nedþearflican hus mid þara broðera honda & fultome, ðæt is cyrican & gemæne eardunghus getimbrede.
& ða het ða broðor in ðæs ilcan huses flore him seað adelfan.
Wæs seo eorðe to ðæs heard & to ðæs stanihte, þæt ðær nænig wiht wyllsprynges beon mihte on gesewen.
Ða hi ða broðor ðæt dydon to geleafan & to benum ðæs Godes ðeowes, ða oðre dæge wæs he wætres ful gemeted.
Þæt ilce wæter æt ðysne ondweardan dæg eallum ðæm ðider cumendum his heofenlicu gifu genihtsumnesse ðegnað.
Þa bæd se Godes man þæt him man isern geloman mid hwæte ðyder brohte þæt land mid to tawienne.
Ða ðæt land ða getawod wæs, & he on gerisne tid mid hwæte hit seow, þa ne com ðær nænig grownes up ne wæstm, ne furðum brordes oð sumeres tid.

Þa neosedon hie eft þa broðor & sohtan, swa heora ðeaw wæs, ða heht he him beresæd bringan, gif wen wære, þæt þæt wexan wolde oðþe ðære eorðan gecynd wære, oþþe willa wæs ðæs uplican gifendes, ðæt ðæs wæstmes eard þær wære upp eornende.

Ða him ða ðæt sæd broht wæs ofer ealle tide to sawenne, & ofer ealne hiht wæsm to berenne he in ðæm ilcan lande seow, þa georn ðær sona upp genihtsumlic yrð & wæstm, & þa wilnedon gereordnesse ðam Godes were <gegearwode> his agnes hondgewinnes.

Mid þy he ða monig gear þær in ancerlife Dryhtne ðeowode, þa gelamp, þæt man mycelne seonoð gesomnode be Alnes streame in þære stowe, þe is cweden æt Twyfyrde, under andweardnesse Ecgferðes ðæs cyninges.
Ðam seonoðe in ealdordome foresæt ðære eadigan gemynde ðeodor ercebiscop; & he ðær wæs mid anmodre geþafunge ealra ðara weotena to biscope gecoren ðære cyrican æt Lindesfarena ea.
& <hi> ða manige ærendwrecan & gewreoto him sendon, & hie hine hweðre nænige ðinga of his wicum & of his stowe to him gelaðian ne mehton.
Ða æt nehstan se foresprecena cyning self, & se halga biscop Trumwine mid him & monige oþre æfeste weras & rice liðon on ðæt ealond.

& eac swylce mænige þara broðra of Lindesfarena ea efncomon to him & ealle heora cneowa begdon, & tearas guton & hine ðurh ðone lifigendon Dryhten halsedon & bædon, oþ þæt hie hine eac swylce teara fulne of his ðæm swetan degolnessum atugon & to ðam seonoðe gelæddon.
Mid þy he ða þyder com, þeah þe he swiðe wiðwinnende wære, mid anmode willan heora ealra he wæs oferswiðed & geneded to onfonne þa ðegnunge biscophades.

Wæs he swyðust mid þy worde oferswiðed, ðætte Bosel se Dryhtnes þeow, þa he him þurh witedomes gast eal þa þing openade & sægde, þa ðe ofer hine cumende wæron, þa he eac swylce forecwæþ, ðæt he toweardlice biscop beon sceolde.

Ne wæs ða hweðre sona his halgunge gedemed; ac <forðagane> ðy wintra, ðe ða toweard wæs, in ðære seolfan Easterlican symbelnesse in Eoferwicceastre wæs gefylled in ondweardnesse Ecgferðes þæs cyninges: & seofen biscopas to his halgunge efencomon, in ðæm ðære eadigan gemynde Theodor biscop ealdordom hæfde.

He ða ðone onfongnan biscophad to onhyrenisse þara eadigra apostola mid weorcum gastlicra mægena frætwode, & þæt bebodene folc, þe he Gode healdan sceolde, ægheþer ge mid his singalum gebedum scylde, ge mid his halwendum moningum & larum to ðæm heofenlican cegde & laðode; & þætte swiðost gewunað halige lareowas gefultuman, swa hwæt swa he mid his worde lærde, he ær mid dædum gefylde.

Wæs he ær eallum ðingum mid þy fyre godcundre lufan hat & weallende, & in geðylde mægene gemetfæst, ond in wilsumnesse haligra gebeda begneorð & geornful; & he wæs eallum gespræce ðam þe to him for intingan frofre comon.
& þæt sylfe he wæs lædende in stowe halges gebedes, gif he ðam untruman broðrum mid his trymenesse & lare fultum sealde.
Forðon he wiste & gemunde: se þe cwæð, lufa ðu þinne Dryhten God, se ilca cwæð, lufa ðu þinne ðone nehstan.
Wæs he mid clæsnunge forhæfdnesse weorð & mære; & symle mid þære gife onbryrdnesse wæs to ðam heofenlican aðened.
Ðæs wæs to tacne, þonne he Gode onsægdnesse bær & mæssan sang, ðæt he his stefne on heanesse ne ahofe, ah forð gotenum tearum of inneweardre heortan Dryhtne his willan bebead.
Ða wæs twa gear ðæt he ðæt biscopsetl swa sæt & heold.
Þa wæs he godcundlice manod, þæt he eft his ealond & his wic gecure & gewilnode; forðon se ingang nealæcte his dæaðdæges, oðþe ma his lifes, forðon ðæt an is soðlic lif to cweðenne.
Swa swa he sylf in ða ilcan tid monegum monnum mid his ðære gewunelican bilwitnes se diglum wordum openade & cyðde, þa mon hweðere æfter fæce sweotollice ongeotan mihte.
Sumum monnum he ðonne þæt ilce openlice onwreah & cydde.
Wæs sum mæssepreost arwyrðes lifes, þæs noma wæs Herebyrht, se wæs geara & longe þæm Godes were in were geðeoded gastlices freondscipes.
Wæs se in ealonde þæs mycclan meres, of ðæm ðe ða fruman aweallað Deorwentan streames; ond ancerlife lifde.
Wæs his gewuna, þæt he syndrigum gearum hine neosade & sohte, & from him monunge gehyrde ecre hæle.
Ða he gehyrde þæt se biscop com to Lugubalia ðære ceastre, ða com he, swa his ðeaw wæs, þider to him & wilnode, ðæt he mid his halwendum trymenessum to ðæm upplican lustum ma & ma onbærned wære.

Ða hie ða betwih him spræcon be haligra fædera life & him betwih bædeweg scencton þæs heofenlican lifes, ða cwæð se biscop betwih: Gemyne ðu broðor Herebryht, þætte þu nu mec frigne & to me spræce, swa hwæt swa ðu wille & ðearfe hæbbe.
Forðon ðe æfter þon ðe wit nu betwih unc nu togangne beoð, ne geseo wit unc ofer ðæt in ðisse weorulde lichomlicum eagum.
Forðon ic cuðlice wat, þæt seo tid minre tolysnesse & minre forðfore is swiðe neah.

Þa he ða ðas word gehyrde, ða feol he to his fotum & mid mycelre eomrunge his tearas geat: & sarlice weop & þus cwæð: Ic ðe halsige þurh ðone lifigendan Drihten, ðæt ðu mec ne forlæte, ac þæt þu sie gemyndig getreowan geðoftan, ond bidde þa uplican arfæstnesse, ðæt þæm Gode, þe wit somod on eorðan ðeowedon ðæt wit eac somod moton to heofenum <feran> his gife þær to geseonne & to sceawigenne.
Forðon þu wast ðæt ic symle teolode to lifigenne to ðines muðes bebode, & swa hwæt swa ic for unwisnesse & for tydernesse agylte, ic þæt to dome ðines willan teolode hraðe to gebetenne.
Ða aðenede se biscop hine in cruce & hine gebæd, & sona wæs in gaste gelæred, þæt he wæs from Dryhtne tigða þære bene, ðe he bæd; ond cwæð.
Aris min broðor & ne wep þu, ah gefeoh & geblissa: forðon seo uplice arfæstnes unc forgeaf, ðæt wit bædon.
Ðæs gehates & ðæs witedomes soð se afterfylgenda becyme ðara wisena geseðde & getrymede.
Forðon ða hie betweoh him togangende wæron, ða hie ofer ðæt lichomlicum eagum ne gesawon; & ane dæge & ðy ilcan, ðæt is ðy ðreotteoðan dægeKalendarum Aprelium, þæt hie wæron of lichoman utgongende.
& heora gastas sona betwih mid eadigre gesihðe geðeodde wæron & midd þa engellican ðegnunge ætgædere to ðæm heofenlican rice gelædde.
Ac Herebyrht wæs ær mid singalre untrumnesse soden & geswenced.

Is ðæt to gelyfenne, þætte þæt wære mid forestihtunge don þære godcundan arfæstnesse, þætte swa hwæt swa he læs & wonan hæfde geearnunge from ðæm eadegan Cuðbrehte, þætte ðæt gefylde & geclænsode þæt sar ðære longan untrumnesse, þæt he swa geefenlicad wære mid þa gife his ðingeres: þæt swa swa he in ane tid & in ða ilcan mid hine of lichoman gongende wæs, þæt he ðonne ec swylce swa mid hine nalas in ungelicum selde þære ecan eadignesse geearnode onfongen beon.
Forðferde se arwyrða fæder Cuðbyrht in Farne ðæm ealonde; & he swiðe georne wæs ða broðor biddende, þæt he ðær eac swylce bebyrged beon moste, þær he mycle tid for Dryhtne campode.
Ond hweðre æt nehstan þæt he wæs mid heora benum oferswiðed, þæt he geðafode, þæt mon his lic lædde to Lindesfarena ea, ond þær in cirican geseted wære.
Ða ðæt geworden wæs, þa heold þære cyrican biscophad an gear wilferð se arwyrða biscop, oðþæt se biscop gecoren wære, se þe fore Cuðbyrhte gehalgod beon sceolde.
Þa wæs æfter þon, ðæt wæs Eadbyrht to biscope gehalgod.

Wæs se wer in wisdome godcundra gewreota & eac swylce somod in hælde heofenlicra beboda ond swiðust in weorcum ælmesdæda weorð & mære, swa ðæt he æghwelce geare æfter Moyses æ, nales ðæt aan feðerfotra neata ac swylce eac ealra wæstma & æppla & hrægla ðone teoðan dæl for Gode to ælmessum ðearfum sealde.

Ðæt wolde ða openlicor æteawan seo godcunde arfæstnes, in hu myclum wuldre se Dryhtnes wer Cuðbyrht æfter his deaðe lifde; þæs his lif ær ðam deaðe mid healicum tacnum heofenlicra wundra openade & æteawde.
Ða wæs ymb endlefen gear þæs ðe he bebyrged wæs, ðætte God onsende in ðara broðra mod, þæt heo woldan his ban geneoman & up ofer eorðan adon.

Tealdon hie & wendon þæt his oðer lichoma ðy ðeawe deadra manna fornumen wære & to duste geworden, & ðæt hie woldon his ban on niwe cyste gedon & in ðære ilcan stowe bufan eorðan gedefelicre arwyrðnesse wel gesettan & gestaðelian.

Þa sægdon hie ðæt & cyðdon Eadbyrhte heora biscope þæt him ðæt licede & leof wære, gif hit his willa wære, ða geðafode he þæt heora geðeahte, & het ðæt hie þæt dydon ðy dæge, þe his gemynddæg wære & his forðfor.

& hie swa dydon: ontyndon his byrgenne & ealne his lichoman gemetton onwalhne & gesundne, swa swa he þa gena lifde, & he wæs begendlic in ðæm geðeodnessum leoða, þæt he wæs myccle gelicra slæpendum menn þonne deadum.
Swylce eac ealle ða hrægl, þa ðe he mid gegearwad wæs, nales ðæt an þæt hie ungewemmed wæron, ah swylce eac swa hwit & swa neowe wunderlice æteawdon, swa he ðy ilcan dæge mid gewered wære.
Þa þæt þa ða broðor gesawon, þa wæron hie swiðe forhte gewordne, & ða efestton ðæm biscope to cyðenne & secgenne ða ðing ðe hie ðær gemetton.
Se þa ænlepe wunode in syndrigre stowe from ðære cyrican, seo wæs æghwonon mid sæs yðum utan ymbgyrded.

In ðisse stowe he simle on ða tid ðæs feowertiglican fæstennes ær Eastrum & eft ðæt feowertig ær Cristes gebyrdtide in mycelre forhæfdnesse & in mycelre wilsumnesse gebeda & in teara gegote <gewunelice> wæs.
In ðære stowe eac swylce se arwyrða his foregenga Cuðbryht, ær ðon þe he Farne þæt ealand gesohte, sum fæc in deagolnesse Dryhtne campode.
Brohton hie ðyder eac swylce ðam biscope ðara hrægla dæl, þe se halga lichoma mid gegyrwed wæs.
& he þære gife ðoncwyrðlice onfeng, & þa wundor lustlice gehyrde ond þa sylfan hrægl mid wunderlicre lufe cyssende wæs, swa <heo> ða gena þam lichoman þæs halgan fæder ymbseald wæron.
& ðus cwæð: Gegyrewað ðone lichoman mid neowum hræglum fore ðam ðe ge ðær on noman, & swa in ða cyste gesettað, þe ge him gegearwodon.
Forðæm ic þæt cuðlice wat, þæt seo stow noht lange æmettig ne wunað, seo mid swa mycelre gife heofenlicre gife gehalgod is.
Ond se bið swiðe eadig se ðe him Drihten, se is ord & syllend ealra eadignessa, forgifeð, þætte he in ðære stowe restan mote.

Þa he ða se biscop ðas word & monig þysses gemetes mid manegum tearum & mid mycelre inbryrdnesse heortan & swylce eac forhtigendre tungan gefylde, ða dydon ða broðor swa he het, ond þone lichoman gegyredon mid neowum hrægle, & in ða neowan cyste gedydon, ðe hi to ðon geworhton, & bufan flore ðære cirican asetton.

Ne wæs þa elding, þætte Gode se leofa biscop Eadbryht wæs mid grimre adle ðread & gestanden; & seo dæghwamlice weox & hefigode, þæt he nalas after miclum fæce he eac swylce to Dryhtne ferde, þæt is ærran dæge Nonas Maias.
Ðæs lichoman þa broðor wæron gesettende in ða byrgenne ðæs gebletsadon fæder Cuðbryhtes & ða cyste bufan gesetton, in ða hie gestaðeledon þa ungebrosendlican leomo þæs ilcan fæder.
In ðære stowe eac swylce oft beoð geworden heofenlicu mægen & hælo tacen untrumra in cyðnesse heora begra geearnunga.
Ða sume we geara for gemynde awriton in ðære bec Cuðberhtes lifes; ac in ðissum ussum stære we sceolon an toætecan, þe us gelamp þæt we neowan gehyrdon.
Wæs in ðæm ilcan mynstre sum broðor, ðæs noma wæs Beadoþegn, se wæs lange tid cumena arðegen þara ðe þæt mynster sohton.
& cwæð, þæt he ða gena lifgende wære, þa he þis gewrit sette.

Hæfde he gewitnesse & cyðnesse from eallum ðæm broðrum & from eallum þam cumendum, þe ðæt mynster sohton, þæt he wæs mycelre arfæstnesse wer, & þære bebodenan ðegnunge eadmodlice underðeoded for intingan heofenlicre meorðe.
Ða eode þes broðor sume dæge, þæt he wolde his reon & his hwitlas, ðam ðe he in cumena bure brucende wæs, in sæ wæscan & feormian.

Ða he ða eft ham hwearf, þa wearð he semninga on middum þæm siðfæte mid hefigre aðle gehrinen & gestonden, swa þæt he hreas & feoll on eorðan & long fæc forðheald licgende wæs; & þa æt nehstan hwon aras.

Þa he arisende wæs, þa gefelde he his lichoman healfne dæl from þæm heafde oð þa fet mid þa aðle geslægene beon, þe Grecas nemnað paralysis, & we cweðað lyftadl; & he mid þy mæstan gewinne mid his crycce hine wreðigende ham becom.
Weox seo adl sticcemælum, & sona on ðære ilcan niht hefigre gefremed wæs, swa ðæt, ða dæg com, þæt he uneaðe þurh hine sylfne ariisan oþþe gan mihte.

Ða wæs he mid þære adle gewæced & geswenced, þa geþohte he on his mode nytte geþeahte, þæt he <wolde> swylce gemete, swa he mihte, to cyrican cuman & to byrgenne þæs arwyrðan fæder Cuðbryhtes, & þær his cneow began & eadmodlice þa uplican arfæstnesse biddan, oð þæt he from ðære adle genered wære, gif him festre wære ðæt, oþþe gif he mid þa godcundan foreseonnesse leng mid ða adle clænsad beon sceolde, ðæt he þæt saar mihte geþyldiglice mid smolte mode aberan & aræfnan.

Þa dyde he, swa he on his mode gehogde, & his ða untruman leomo mid his crycce wreðgende eode in cyrican; & hine wæs in gebed streccende æt lichoman þæs Godes weres & mid arfæstre ingehygde þurh his fultum wæs Dryhten biddende, þæt he him arfæst & milde wære.
Ond þa betwih his gebede & bene ðæt he hwon onslep.

Ða gefelde he, swa swa he seolfa æfter sægde, swa swa mycel hond & brad his heafod gehrine in ðæm dæle, þe þæt sar & seo adl on wæs, & mid þære ilcan gehrinenesse ealne þone dæl his lichoman, ðær he mid þære adle gehefigod wæs, on styccemælum fleondum þæm <sare> & æfterfylgendre hælo geondgoten wæs.
Ða ðis ðus geworden wæs, sona ðæs ðe he onwoc, ða aras he hal & gesund.
Ond he for his hælo eft Dryhtne þonc secgende wæs & þæm halgan were his fultomes gyfe; & he ðæt eac swylce þæm broðrum cyðde & sægde, hwæt ymb hine gedon wæs; & hie in þæm ealle blissedon & gefegon.
& he æfter ðære ðreaunge ðe geclænsodra to his ðegnunge eft hwerf, þe he ær wel & bighydiglice heold & bigeode.

Swylce eac ða <gegyrelan> & ða hrægl, ðam ðe Gode ðone gehalgodan lichoman Cuðberhtes oðþe ær lifes ende oþþe æfter forðferedne gyredon, ða eac swylce from hælo gyfe ne adweledon, swa swa in ðære bec his lifes & his mægena gemet swa hwylc swa hy rædeð & leornað.
Nis ðæt eac swylce to forswugienne, ðætte nu ær þrim gearum þurh his reliquias geworden wæs, & me nu neowan þurh ðone sylfan broðor gecuðode, in ðæm þe hit geworden wæs.
Wæs ðis gedon in ðæm mynstre, þe big Docore ðære ea getimbred is, & from ðære ea noman onfeng, ðam mynstre ða in abbodes onwalde fore wæs Swiðbyrht, se wæs æfest wer.
Wæs in ðæm mynstre sum geong monn, ðam unwlitig swylce & atolic his eagan breg wyrde & wemde.
& se dæghwamlice wæs weaxende, & ðæs eagan forwyrde tobeotode.
Teoleden his læcas & ðone swylce mid sealfum & mid beþinge geðwænan woldon; ac hie ne mehton.
Sume lærdon ðæt hine mon aweg acurfe; sume þæt beweredon for maran frecennesse.

Mid þy ða se foresprecena broðor langere tide ðyllic ungescræpo woon, ne ða tobeotiendan frecernesse ðam eagum mannes hond gehælan mihte ac a dæghwæmlice wæs wyrse & wyrse, ða gelamp <him> semninga mid gife þære godcundan arfæstnesse þurh reliquias ðæs halgan fæder Cuðbryhtes gehæledne beon.

Forðon ða þa broðor his lichoman æfter manegum gearum his bebyrgednesse ungewemmedne & ungebrosnodne gemetton, þa <genamon> hi sumne dæl his feaxes him to reliquium, þæt hie mihton heora biddendum freondum syllan, oþþe æteawan in tacon ðæs wundres.
Ðyssa reliquia dæl in ða tid mid him hæfde sum mæssepreost þæs ilcan mynstres, ðæs noma wæs ðrydred, se æfter wæs ðæs ilcan mynstres abbod.

Ða wæs he sume dæg in ða cyrican gongende & ða cyste ontynde þara reliquia, þæt he heora sumne dæl his biddendum freonde sealde, þa gelomp þæt se ilca geonga, se ðe on his eagan untrum wæs, þa in ðære ilcan cyrican wæs ondweard.
Mid þy he ða se mæssepreost ðone dæl, þe he wolde, his freonde sealde, ða sealde he þæt oðer þam geongan men; heht þæt he in heora stowe hie gesette & gedyde.
Ða he ða þæm feaxe onfeng þæs halgan heafdes, ða wæs he mid halwendre onbryrdnesse manod, ðæt he togesette þam untruman brege; & sum fæc ðone ungeþwæran swyle mid <þyde> & þwænde.
Þa he ðæt gedon hæfde, þa sette he þa <reliquias> in heora cyste, swa he haten wæs, ond gelefde þæt his eage for ðy fexe þæs Godes weres, þæm he hrinen wæs, hraðe gehæled wære.
Ne hine owiht his geleafa wægde.
Wæs ða seo æftere tid dæges, swa he sylf sægde, ða he þæt dyde; ond þa dyde forð þone dæg, ðæt he don ær ðohte.
Ða hit wæs foreweard middæg ðæs seolfan dæges, þa semnunga gehran he his eagan; þa gemette he hit swa hal & swa gesund mid þy brege swa him næfre ænig swyle oþþe unwlitegnes ne æteaude.
